11.title: Inuyasha Girls

111.content: This choice chapter is for the writers that want her.
111.title: Kagome-chan

1111.content:
You were watching an episode of Inuyasha and you were thinking about Kagome, which you have a crush on her.

'Kagome, if you were here I would show you my feelings for you.' you said in your mind

Soon the episode was over and you turned off the tv before turning off the lights in your room. You got into bed and slowly went to sleep thinking of kagome and mentally wishing that she was here in the real world with you. As you dreamed of your crush, there is a shooting star flying over your house and it glowed in response to your mental wish.

When it was morning, you woke up hearing your phone alarm plus the rays of the ball of light shining in your face.

'Another dream that won't come true.' You thought before getting ready for the day.

While you were getting ready, your thoughts were replaying the dream of you meeting your dream crush and your phone was going off again like a message from someone or call coming in.

“Hello?” You asked wondering who was calling you.

“Good morning, (Your Name), it's Alex.” They said and you nodded your head.

“Yeah, phone and the glaring ball of hot gas woke me up.” You said

“Another dream of your crush?” They asked

“Yep.” You said sadly.

“Well, we can hangout today till something happens.” They said as the call ended and you went to finish getting ready for your day with your friend.

Unknown to you, your wish was granted and you and your friend will be with the person of your dreams. A person standing on the roof of the apartment building you live in eating an apple.

“Soon you will have your chance.” They said before fading into the wind like a ghost.

Soon you walked outside wearing a white windbreaker, black muscle shirt, dark blue jeans, and red runnimg shoes.

“I'm glad it's getting closer to winter.” You said to yourself.

“Hey, (Your Name)!” Alex called out and you turned around to see a person wearing a grey jacket, yellow shirt, black pants, and blue combat boots.

“Hey Alex.” You said and they nodded.

Both of you went to get something to eat for breakfast and after that you two went for a walk in the forest.

You were talking about your dreams of your crush to Alex and you were getting tips about the dreams about what they could mean.

During the walk, both of you found a stone built well and you recognize it as the Bone-eater Well.

“This was never here before now.” You said walking around it.

“That's the well?” Alex asked and you nodded.

Both of you were examining it before the ground shook with enough force to make you two fall into the well. There was a glow of the well before it faded and the well with it. Everything went black for you two.

12532.content:
(the writer who wrote this chapter wants to remain in the shadows)

You are an expert duelist from New Domino city. Although you do not consider yourself to be up to the ranks of Yugi Moto and Seto Kaiba, you surely consider yourself better than the scrubs that populate your city. There was one girl you respected however. Her name was Akiza Izinski and she was perhaps one of the best duelists out there. You arrived at her house, knocking on the door in anticipation. As you waited, several strategies flew through your head on how to be Akiza. You and her were practically even in terms of battle strength and being the competitive man that you were, didn't like that. There had to be away to destroy Akiza without breaking a sweat. You just knew it.

The door flew open and Akiza's smiling face was reveled. You on the other hand were not smiling. You were determined to beat Akiza once and for all. You thought about all the cards in your deck: Dark Magician Girl, Dark Magician, Swords of Revealing Light, Change of Heart, Pot of Greed, Black Luster Solider, Red Eyes Black Dragon, Labyrinth, Mind Control, F.G.D., Judgement Dragon, Acid Trap Hole, Trap Dustshoot, Kuriboh, Cyber-Stein, Stardust Dragon, as well as many other cards that would finally seal the demise of Akiza.

"Alright, Akiza. Enough of the friendly face. Let's duel!"

"Oh Ryan. Always so eager to duel. Just come in. Let's talk...as friends."

"No way. Not until I beat you!"

The minor conflict caused Akiza's tattoo to glow a reddish hue. Her body slowly began expanding. Her arms got wider and longer, as did her legs and head. Her body expanded in all directions. It looked like Akiza was growing in height right before the eyes of her rival! Akiza pushed you out of the way and ran out of her house into the middle of the sidewalk. You could only sit and watch at Akiza's transformation. Akiza's height shot up to seven feet. Then ten. Then fifteen. Then twenty-five. Akiza stopped growing at a whopping fifty feet.

"Whoa," Akiza said. "How did I get so big?"

You were completely speechless. Akiza turned her giant head towards you and stared you down.

"Still wanna duel?" Akiza taunted.
12532.title: It Begins!

choices: Make both her and you shrink
Make Akiza enter into her Dark Akiza Form
125322.content:
You were scared, you just saw one of the best female duelists in Domino City grow, right before your eyes. "So, would you like to answer my question anytime soon?" Akiza asked, still having a taunting tone to her voice. "W-well, m-maybe n-not t-today. M-maybe t-tomorrow." You answered.

Akiza shed a giggle, shaking the ground into a light earthquake. You, being scared out of your pants, quickly used your duel disk to activate a duel with yourself, and summoned Stardust Dragon to fly away. "Ryan. Where must you be going?" Akiza said, plucking you from Stardust Dragon's back.

"Waaah!" You yelled, being held by Akiza's fingers. "Why are you so scared Ryan?" Akiza asked. "Oh, you're so tiny compared to me! You're just so cute!"

Akiza is obviously deciding to try and play around with you, so you had to make a drastic plan to get away. "It's either now or never." You thought.

"Stardust Dragon! I activate you're second ability to Mirage Synchro (A New type of Synchro that allows any Dragon to synchro with another dragon in the deck, tuner or not) you with Judgement Dragon!" You said. "Rise! Judgement Lord Stardust!" The Warrior Dragon monster rose from the ground. "Now! Use Judgement Mirage Blast!" You said.

Judgement Stardust Lord launched Several Sword Beams at Akiza's form, but it has some nasty side affects, which...

choices: Ash turns around and is struck with fear.
141.content:
(the writer who wrote this chapter wants to remain in the shadows)

Ash and Misty were walking through the Petalburg Woods. Ash was celebrating his recent victory over Roxanne, a battle that came down to the wire. Misty could only watch as the ageless boy skipped along the dirt path that led deeper into the forest. While Ash was busy taunting, Misty took this time to appreciate the finer things in life. These woods were home to some of the most exotic pokemon. She looked up into the trees, but didn't spot any pokemon. What she did spot, however, was another type of wild life.

Hanging from the dark brown branch of a low tree was a golden berry. Misty, naturally curious, plucked the berry and marveled at it's shiny plate. Misty brought the unique fruit up to her nose and sniffed. It smelled just like any other berry. Curious if it contained a exotic flavor, Misty bit into the berry. Instantly her tongue tasted a magnitude of flavors. Cherry, vanilla, banana, chocolate, blueberry, even a couple of flavors she couldn't even describe. However, her tongue wasn't the only thing undergoing a transformation.

Misty slowly grew. Her legs, torso, and everything that was her expanded in proportion. Her height slowly grew. 7 feet. 8 feet. 9 feet. 10. But then her height gradually began to grow as the flavor in her mouth faded. 15 feet. 25 feet. 40 feet. As the flavor from the golden completely depleted, Misty stood in awe as she was fifty feet tall.

"Um...Ash." Misty whispered.
141.title: The Mysterious Berries

choices: Explains how it will nullify if she eats 2.
1412.content:
"Woah Misty!" Ash laughed. "Looks like you ran into the Hoenn Crawford Berries." "What..are those?" Misty whispered, though it came out in a demanding tone. "They'll make any girl grow to 50ft, and it won't stop there, most will grow up to over 20,000ft tall." Ash explained, detailing what Brock had told them back in Johto.

"So...I'm going to be a Giantess?" Misty whispered. "Very. The only sad part is, they don't work on boys." Ash said. He walked over and picked another of the same berries Misty found, and popped it in his mouth. Sure his tongue was filled with what Misty had experienced, but no growth happened.

"See?" Ash said. "Cool. Hey, can you put a bunch in your bag?" Misty whispered.

Ash..

choices: May now in Unova (Growth in this chapter)
142.content:
May sat on her bed, looking at a framed photo of her, Ash, Brock, and her younger brother Max, who was now on his Pokemon Journey, he did update May every once and a while, but it was mainly about the gym badges he was winning, he already had 4, and was coming home soon to challenge Norman, their father, to a gym battle, to win the Balance Badge.

May held the photo tightly to her chest, missing everyone who was in it, most especially Ash. She went to the Pokemon Center, to see if she could call Ash, to see how well he was doing on his journey to become a True Pokemon Master.

May walked to the Pokemon Center, and sat at a booth to call Ash. When he picked up, he greeted May. "How's it going?" He asked. "Well, nothing much. Max is now on his Pokemon Journey, I've been at home, missing you-, I mean, training." May stuttered.

"May, if you miss me so much, then why don't you come visit me in Unova?" Ash suggested. "Unova? Where is that?" May asked. "Far off the coast of Kanto, if you want, I can come back for a while, and arrange us a trip there?" Ash said. "Sure." May said, brightning up.
142.title: May

choices: May makes it to Mistralton, finding Ash's Friends Iris and Cilan
1421.content:
With Ash now by her side on the plane, May was heading to Unova. "Ash, where is the plane headed?" May asked. "Mistralton City, I had just won my 6th Gym Badge when you called me." Ash answered.

"So, who is it your traveling with now?" May asked, trying to have the courage to move her hand into the boy she had feelings for. "A Girl named Iris, and a Gym Leader named Cilan, they're awesome friends." Ash said.

Just as they were talking, the plane was struck down by a powerful Aura Sphere attack. The Plane crashed, but all had been safe, except for Ash and May. They landed far beyond in the Moor of Iccirus.

"What happened?" Ash said, when he woke up, he found that May was already gone, but what May was actually doing, was looking for food for both her and Ash, because she doesn't know where they are, or what they are doing here.

She found a small bush, and found some berries that looked near the species of Oran Berries, so she picked them, placing them in her bandana, to keep them fresh.

Because she was hungry, May took a small handfull of about 15 out of the 65 she had spent time picking.

She tossed them in her mouth, and chewed them, soon swallowing them, but she regretted that, as she passed out as soon as the berries hit her stomach acids.

When she finally awoke, she found Ash looking up at her, wait, looking up at her? She always remembered being a few inches shorter than Ash. "May! What happened?" Ash shouted to the giantess, who was litterally on her hands and knees, struggling to fit in the forest, but had to stand up. She realized how small the forest looked, and how she was a giantess.

"Oh no! Ash!" May said, her voice booming throughout the skies. She lowered her giant gloved hand down to where Ash was, and urged him to step on. "What happened to you!" Ash yelled, when he was looking towards May's face. "I don't know. I ate a few berries, and passed out, then I was like this." May boomed. "Are those the berries!" Ash yelled, being lowered down, and pointing to a spilled pile of 50 berries, all looking pale, without juice inside.

"Yeah, those are them." May boomed. "May, these are Iccirus Berries, they're very dangerous!" Ash yelled. "You have to be at least 400ft. tall!" "How did they spill, they were in my..bandana...where's my Bandana!!" May said, feeling her head. "It's right over there." Ash said, pointing to the gargantuan bandana that had been stained light blue by the berry juice.

May wrapped the bandana around her hair, so she looked how she did normally, and picked Ash up again. "We should find your friends. I'll place you somewhere safe." May boomed. She lifted her bandana up, and put Ash in there, leaving him in the dark with May's soft, conditioned hair.

"Could you maybe slow down?!" Ash yelled. "Sorry Ash, I'm a giantess, I can't really control moving speed, but I'll try to slow down." May said.

May tried to slow down, but that really didn't help Ash at his size compared to May. She eventually reached Mistralton, and took Ash out of her bandana. "Is this the city you were in?" May boomed throughout the entire city, which began running in panic. The only three who didn't run, were Iris, Cilan, and Pikachu. "Who are you! Put Ash down now!" Iris yelled to May. "Oh, you two must be Iris and Cilan. Oh! Pikachu! I see you!" May said, picking the three up gently in her palm, and set Ash down on it.

"Oh, you must be May!" Cilan said. "Ash never mentioned he had a Giantess as a traveling partner before." Iris said. "Well, I wasn't a Giantess before, during our journey through Hoenn, but I did grow recently, thanks to some Iccirus Berries." May said.

May decided to set the small (to her) trio of trainers down onto the ground, however keeping Pikachu in her gargantuan gloved hand. "Pikachu, why must you be so cute?" May boomed, standing to her full height, and began petting Pikachu as lightly as possible with her large finger.

After being pet, Pikachu let out a glorious "PIKACHU" before May set him down. "Hey Ash, what would you think, if I did, this." Joseph (Otherwise known as me, PKMNGod) was walking through Petalburg City, as now having four of the eight required Pokemon Gym Badges to face the Petalburg Gym, whose Leader was the normal type user Norman.

Joseph entered the Gym with his 3 Pokemon, Marshtomp, who Joseph felt was close to evolving, Swellow, the first Pokemon Joseph had every caught; of course started as a small Taillow, and Manectric, a Pokemon he had found abused in the wild, who now is a faithful partner.

Joseph saw Norman the gym leader, talking to a girl, this girl who knew as May, a Pokemon Coordinator who traveled with the Legendary Pokemon Trainer Ash Ketchum. May seemed to have tears streaking down her cheeks, as she ran outside, she accidentally bumped into Joseph.

14221.content:
"Hey, mind if I go cheer up your daughter?" Joseph asked. "Do your best, she's really upset. Her room is done that hall." Norman said, pointing to a room at the end of the hall. "Alright, thank you sir." Joseph said.

Joseph went down the hall to what he assumed to be May's room, and knocked on the locked door. "Who's there?" said a weak voice from inside. "You don't know me, but you did bump into me earlier." Joseph said. "Oh, you're that most recent trainer my Dad fought, aren't you?" May said, opening the door, letting Joseph in. "Yeah, what happened?" Joseph asked.

"Well, I recieved a call from my friend, Ash Ketchum, he told me how he recently dominated the Sinnoh League, and I wanted to visit him as a surprise, but my Dad won't let me go all the way out to Sinnoh again." May explained.

"Alright, how about you tell me about yourself, you are a gym leaders' daughter, you're life must be interesting." Joseph asked. "Not really, I'm a Coordinator, I've taken first in both Hoenn and Johto Grand Festivals." May said. "What about you?"

"Well, I'm a Pokemon Trainer, just like your friend, Ash Ketchum, but I'm so much weaker, and this is my partner Marshtomp." Joseph said, calling out his Pokemon. "Oh, well he looks strong." May said.

"Thanks. Anyway, me and Marshtomp, along with my other Pokemon, have won, well now, we've one 5 of the 8 gym badges, Marshtomp was able to stand against your Dad's Slaking." Joseph said. "Both of them?! That's quite a strong Pokemon." May said, beginning to cheer up.

"Thanks, me and him train for hours a day at a time." Joseph said. "Well, that's about it for me." "You're life is so much more interesting then mine." May said. "Thanks for cheering me up by the way." May then gave Joseph a kiss, but just on the cheek, then...
14221.title: Joseph asks if he can go comfort her (Shrink 1)...

choices: Joseph is able to make it to May's shoe (Don't Notice yet)
Joseph is unable to make it in time,  but May notices something before going off
142211.content:
"May, promise me you'll cheer up fully. I hate to see when people are sad or upset." Joseph said. "Alright, I'll do my best." May said, smiling. "Good." Joseph said. Joseph saw as May actually fell asleep, and he smiled, going to leave the room, letting her sleep in peace.

As Joseph reached the door of May's room, he felt a pain in his stomach. "What the?" Joseph asked himself, clutching his stomach. He fell to his knees, and saw everything increasing in size.

"May, help, please." Joseph stuttered in shock, but May was already fast asleep. Joseph passed out from the pain, and continued to shrink to not even 1/10th of his original size.

An hour later....

Joseph woke up to find the lights on, and he saw a gargatuan May sitting on her bed, reading a book. "Judging how big the tile on the floor is compared to me." Joseph said. "I guess I'm at least 1/1000th of my original size." He sighed, and decided to begin walking towards May's bed, this time to recieve her help.

After another 2 hours of running, Joseph was far too tired to continue. "It took me 2 hours to get here, how am I gonna get to May without spending years to do it?" Joseph asked himself.

May sighed, and realized she had to go to the bathroom. "'Oh man, I'd better get going! If she's gonna head there, this may be my only chance." Joseph said. As May slipped her socked feet into her red tennishoes, Joseph made a run of faith to get to her shoe.

Dawn was still on her adventure with infamous trainers Ash and Brock, meeting a lot of new Pokemon, and a lot of challenging trainers. "Y'know Ash, that Staravia of yours really needs to evolve." Dawn said, as Staravia had still not evolved, even after learning it's best move; known as Brave Bird.

choices: she would wait til morning to show off her new size
she would stomp her foot near the camp, causing an earthquake and waking them

1431.content:
As Dawn was walking, she suddenly noticed a tree with strange berries on it. Unsure as to their kind, she noticed a little plaque laid out before the base of the tree. It read: "Macroberries. Capable of causing great growth. Do NOT touch"
Reading it over, Dawn smiled with delight. She had her answer. However, she knew that by taking a berry or two, she would be stealing. So, to be clever, she pulled the plaque from the ground and threw it away, so that she could play ignorant if she got caught. Satisfied, Dawn pulled a berry off the tree and ate it. In a moment, she began to notice that the tree line was at her head level, then down to her breast height, then her stomach, then hips, thighs, knees and finally she stopped growing when the trees were up to her ankle only.
Mesmerized by the view from her height, Dawn looked down at the camp site where her two unknowing friends were sleeping. "Heheheh, time to teach them a lesson" she said. "But how to proceed?" she wondered aloud.
1431.title: Dawn finds special Macroberries

15533.title: Still more

1553311.content:
This line of story takes place after future Link defeated Ganon...

Navi was in Kokiri Forest, it had been a measly year since Navi had to leave Link by himself, due to the Deku Tree Sprout (Who had now become the full Deku Tree)'s command.

Navi went over to Saria's house; Saria had been an old friend of both Link and herself, and she was the person who Navi spoke to, whenever she felt like talking to someone.

"So, Navi, how's the Deku Tree coming along?" Saria asked.

"Oh good, he and I talk every day, we're just getting along, like me and the Great Deku Tree did." Navi answered, is her small squeaky voice.

Later that Night....

Navi lay in her small bed, which was made by Link when they had traveled together; it was a little goodbye present. She then opened her eyes, not able to sleep, and decided to go see the Deku Tree.

The Deku Tree, however was sleeping, and Navi saw the Kokiri Emerald, which had been returned by the fair Princess Zelda, which should now be called as Queen Zelda, as she is the true ruler of the Hyrulian Land.

Navi saw the Kokiri Emerald wiggle, and wiggle, and eventually begin to fall off. She tried to catch it, but due to lack of true hands, she ended up having to hold it with her entire form. A green glow come from the Kokiri Emerald blinded her sight, and gave her the power to---allow her to change into a human like fairy.

After her body touched the Kokiri Emerald, there was a flash of light and to her everything looked smaller. She flew to a mirror and she looked to see her new form. She is 6’3”, has light tan skin color, transparent blue and white wings, ocean blue eyes, wearing a set of clothes with different shades and tints of blue, and has sky blue hair. She is also wearing a gold necklace around her neck with little emeralds, gold bracelets on her wrists with little rubies, and gold ankle bracelets with little sapphires in them.

All right, so this is after the Deku Tree has woken up, seeing Navi in a human state, knowing it is her because her wings are out.

"Navi, is that you, how art thou is such a humanly form as the Hero of Time? Was it my Kokiri Emerald that did that to you?" Deku Tree asked.

Navi looked at the Deku Tree before blushing with a smile.

"Yes, it is me Great Deku Tree. The Emerald did this to me." She said

"So, Navi, why have thou done this. Does thou wish to see thine Hero of Time once again? Is this why thou had used the prowess of the crystal to make you a human-fairy hybrid?"

She just shook her head and shrug her shoulders.

"It just happened and I don't know why the crystal changed me into this form." She said

"Hmm. Maybe it wishes for thou to do something with its powers. Well, whatever it may be, will you accept the challenge?" Deku Tree asked.

She looked at her body before looking back at the Deku Tree with a smile.

"Yes, I will accept the challenge head on." She said with determination

"Well, Mine mind has known of thus challenge for years, if thee are willing, I shall tell it to you." Deku Tree said. "First, you must returnith to me with the other Spiritual Stones, as you know, the Goron Ruby, and Zora Sapphire."

Navi nodded.

"I will return with the Spiritual Stones." Navi said

"Alright. I expect thee to come back successful." Deku Tree said

Navi nodded before flying out of the forest to avoid being noticed by the Kokiris.

"I hope she does well." Deku Tree said, before falling back to sleep.

Navi flew till she reached the entrance of the Kokiri Forest and she looked back into the forest remembering Link and Sara, but her form start to switch between fairy and human. Soon her body is human only with her wings and she started to walk toward goron's mountain.

“I need to make it to the Goron Sanctuary before I fully change back to fairy, and this challenge would be for nothing.” Navi said, switching between flying and running towards Kakiriko Village.

As Navi was running/flying to Kakiriko Village, a person notice her and he was running to catch up to her. He was wearing a tan cloak with his face covered and covering his clothes, he looked to be a head taller than navi; but he has black clothes under his cloak and his face is Hyrulean.

"Who are you?" Navi asked, panting from running, as it was her first time.

"Just a traveler passing through and I think that you may need some help with your challenge." The man said with a smile before picking up Navi and putting her on his back

"How...do you know of the...challenge? I thought only the Deku Tree knew."

The man smiled before picking up speed as she wrapped her arms around his neck.

"He still does, but as for how I knew; it’s one of my gifts and I can tell that you will need a hand reaching the top of the mountain.," the man said as he reached the stairs and ran up in a flash into the village and onto the gate

"Thanks for the help." Navi said to the man, now at the base of Goron Mountain.

"May I possibly get your name?"

The man was thinking for a moment before setting her on the ground and a sword appeared on his back.

"My name is Fado Zheitk."

"You may still need my help.," He said with a smile

"Thanks for the assistance. Let's continue up the mountain shall we?" Navi asked.

He nodded before running up the mountain with her.

"Yes, let's." He said as he pulled out his sword ready for anything

The two ran up the mountain, Fado taking on any fire Tectites with his sword, until they finally reached the Goron Sanctuary by nightfall.

"Thanks for the help. It was...helpful. I guess I could say." Navi said, shaking hands with Fado. "I'll go get the Goron Ruby."

Navi walked into the sanctuary and went to speak with the leader of the gorons.

"I have come for the Goron Ruby." She said

"The Goron Ruby?" Darunia asked.

"Why would you ever want such a thing? Sure I have it, but it's with my son Link in the Fire Temple."

"I have a challenge from the Deku Tree and I need the Goron Ruby for it." Navi explained

"Alright." Darunia said simply, pushing the statue he stood in front of to reveal the door to the Volcano.

"You know the way Navi." He said.

She nodded with a smile before she walked into the volcano to get inside the fire temple.

"Yes, Thank you Darunia." She said before leaving for the volcano

Navi entering the Volcano, got extremely sweaty, and then soon collapsed.

"Too...much...heat. I must keep going though" Navi said, continuing on.

She made it to the Fire Temple, and met with Darunia's son, who was named after Link.

"Hey, Dad told me you were coming, let me lead you to the Goron's Ruby." Link said.

"Yes thank you, Link." She said following him to the ruby

Link the Goron led Navi through the Fire Temple, took the Goron Ruby out of a Wall, and gave it smiling to Navi without a word.

"Thank you very, Link. I shall now leave." Navi said, leaving with the Goron Ruby.

Soon navi left the temple and the volcano with the goron ruby.

"Thank you Darunia for the ruby." Navi said stopping by the leader of the gorons and leaving to meet with fado outside of the sanctuary.
1553311.title: Navi is given a challenge to gather the stones

choices: Lunch and Possible reunion with a fairy
15533111.content:
-XII, XXIV-

A normal day of winter passed over Kokiri Forest, it has been a full five years since the legendary Hero of Time stood his own against the Gerudo King in battle. Peace had returned to Hyrule in the time and seasons began to make realm-goers fully aware. The Great Deku Tree's offspring, who went simply by the name Deku, given to him by Queen Zelda when she returned the Kokiri Emerald; was waiting for a familiar blue fairy to come for her daily visit.

A small blue light flying to the offspring of the Great Deku Tree and it was the fairy, Navi. "I'm sorry Deku, I made you wait too long." Navi said.

"It's quite alright Navi." Deku smiled. "How are you feeling lately? It's been five years since you left Link, are you still depressed you can no longer see him?" Deku asked that question every day, but never really got a reply. He wondered when it'd be different.

She sighed at the thought. "Yes, but I think I will see him again if I was on a quest. I'm feeling ok as usual, but I still miss him." She said

"Well then Navi, do come closer." Deku said, as the small fairy neared him. "I was going to send Saria on a journey to Castle Town across Hyrule Field for an errand." Deku muttered. "How about instead of her regular fairy partner, you assist her this time around." "Come back tonight for she'll leave tomorrow." Deku said. "I'll have a present to behold you with."

Navi was surprised to hear that Deku would send on with Saria on an errand to the castle, but she nodded and she felt happy. "Thank you, Deku. I will come back tonight for your gift." She said

-XII, XXV- (Midnight)

Deku stayed awake for the time being, waiting for Navi to arrive. He planned to give her a brand new form she could change in and out of at will by giving her the power in the Kokiri Emerald. She would become slightly human, while retaining Hyrulian and Kokiri skin color, she'd also gain height and bodily features.

A light blue light coming to him and it was Navi like she promised earlier in the day. "I had to wait for everyone to fall asleep before coming here, Deku." Navi said

"That is quite alright Navi." Deku smiled. "Now do you see the Kokiri Emerald hung upon the Sacred Branch?" Deku smiled as the Kokiri Emerald swung from the Branch and fell towards Navi, slowly reducing in size, and falling around her like a jewel necklace. "Focus your energy and power." Deku said. "Focus, and then behold."

"Okay, Deku." She said. She did as he asked and focused her energy and power.

Navi began to focus her energy, and her body began to form from a light of a fairy to a Hyrulian body.

She opened her eyes and was startled by her new form, but still kept her focus on her energy. "Is this your gift Deku?" She asked looking over her body.

"Yes, my dearest Navi." Deku smiled down to her, as she was not able to fly up to his face. "However might I suggest putting these on." Deku dropped her a female Kokiri outfit remodeled and recolored to fit and style her. It was an aquatic blue dress skirt with blue leggings, a belt that drooped down a tad, and her shirt brinking just off her shoulders and being able to button.

She had looked down and noticed that she was naked before making an 'eep' sound. She took the clothes and went behind the Deku tree before putting on the clothes. "Thank you, Deku." She said with haste before coming out into his line of sight wearing the clothes.

"You're welcome Navi. I just thought you might want some clothes so you don't go running through the forest naked. While they be eternal children, the Kokiri are still kids, they aren't, como de' say, 'ready' to see a naked body." Deku explained. "Now go find Saria, I've informed her you'd be unfamiliar, but go now Navi."

Navi nodded and she ran off to find Saria. "I'll see you later, deku; after we have completed the quest." She said before running off to find Saria.

Saria waited in her home, twiddling her thumbs and waiting for Navi. The Deku Tree had called Saria saying Navi would soon come and look very different.

Soon enough there was a knock on the door. "Saria, it's me, Navi." Navi said through the door.

Saria opened the door, and saw the new Navi. "Navi? Well, Deku was right, you do look way different." She giggled. "Come on in."

Navi came in as Saria closed the door. "It was his gift for the trip to the castle." Navi said smiling. "How is being a sage, Saria?" She asked.

"It's a little tough. Being a kid and having to act like an adult I mean." Saria said. "But I guess I have to learn to grow up even if I can't do it physically." She smiled. "Anyway, I was gonna head out as soon as you got here." She said, walking over to a chair where a light sack lay.

"Do you miss link after he saved you in the Forest Temple?" Navi asked

Saria blushed at recounting the memories of Link. "Oh, of course I do. I mean he lives in Castle Town. I thought I might as well stop by the house the carpenters built for him in the field path leading to Hyrule Castle." Saria said. "So why don't we get going." Saria said, beginning to leave the house.

Navi nodded. "Yes, we need to go." She agreed as she followed her friend.

Saria opened the door and walked with Navi outside the forest exit, and through Hyrule Field. Saria knew of the dangers at night, but it is the dawn of morning now, any monsters that would have appeared probably would've burned back into the ground. They encounter the bridge crossing into Castle Town, and walked in.

The townsfolk are slowly beginning their day as they walked over to the path leading to the castle, but Navi noticed a kid looking like a preteen wearing black clothes with a sword on his back. "Mom, I'm going to my sword training lesson." The boy said. "Okay, just try not to get hurt to bad and stay away from those bullies from school." A voice said from the house. "I'll try, but it seems they want to fight me and they lost." The body said before closing the door. The boy left and ran up the path to the castle like the way they were heading. Navi turned to Saria. "Saria, did you see that kid going the same way we are?" She asked

"I did, yeah." Saria said. "I wonder what business he has with the Queen." "Alright, you go see Link first if you want, I'm gonna stay here and get groceries and supplies for Deku." Saria smiled.

Navi nodded. "I'll meet you at his house and you can talk with him before we go see the Queen." She said as she walked up the path to the castle.

As Navi was walking up the path up to the castle, but noticed the boy at the house Link lived in and he went inside. "Link, I'm here for my lessons.," the boy said. "Alright, Fado. We will begin with the basics like before we move on the last move you were learning." A voice said sounding like an older male.

Link had been teaching a boy, named Fado, the way of the sword. The boy was a mid-teenager, and wielded a sword that had very slight resemblance to the Master Sword, which Link no longer had himself, but was still inside the stone at the Temple of Time. Link wielded a regular longsword for the practices he did with Fado.

"Now Fado, you began learning of my downward strike yesterday, can you show me what you've practiced?" Link asked, pulling out a wooden dummy from a closet.

Fado nodded before unsheathing his sword taking aim at the dummy before striking down with his sword hitting the dummy.

Link clapped his hands, at the impressive deep cut, but it had only made it about halfway through the dummy before his sword got stuck. "Watch this Fado." Link smiled, holding the longsword. Link stood and faced another dummy, and simply hit his sword on the ground, and it sent a jolt through the wood and sliced the dummy in half from under it.

"How did you do that, Link?" Fado asked amazed by his teacher.

"Years of practice, Fado." Link said. "If you add enough force to your hand area when you strike downwards, all that power is converted into the sword and then into the ground, creating a light seismic shock."

Fado nodded, but felt he could try something like his teacher did. Turning to his dummy again, he raised his sword, but focused some of his power into his sword with the thought 'My sword is an extension of myself' and he strike the dummy again harder than before.

Fado's original slice was furthered much deeper with the new slice, and Link was impressed. "Good work. Now, today we should try the spin attack." Link smiled. With his longsword, Link stood in a battle ready pose, and imbuing his own magic energy into the sword, unleashed a light sword and span like a tornado, slicing another dummy in half and the force made the dummy shatter against the wall.

Fado nodded before his face gained a determined look and focused more of his own energy getting a light sword. He moved into a stand between that same dummy and another one before spinning like a tornado was well.

Fado sliced, but the way he spun was off and only made a three inch slice, whereas Link's slice had cut all the way through. "Maybe the spin attack was a little tough at first, and I shouldn't have expected you to be perfect." Link said. "How about we take a lunch, and resume afterwards?"
15533111.title: Navi's Quest and Fado's Training

choices: Final challenge: Into the Master Sword?
15533112.content:
When Navi came out to see Fado with the ruby in her hands, he gently smiled before handing her a bag to keep it safe. He hold her in his arms as she is holding the bag and he jumped off the mountain gliding into the village

"I hope you like to fly." He said with a smile

"Well Fado, I am part fairy, just so you know, so gliding and flying are just my forte." Navi said smiling

It was time for their journey to take them towards the Zora Lands to get the Sapphire of which lay there.

As they reached the village, he dived into the village and soon he slammed his feet into the ground. His boots negated the pain in his legs and skidded a few feet before he started to run again out of the village. He jumped over the stairs before setting her down on the ground.

"Which way to the zoras?" He asked

"It should be south of here, just about a mile near here." Navi said

"So, we're a mile away from completing your challenge." Fado said

"Yup." Navi said as they both began to run to the Zora Sanctuary

He jumped into the river as she was running on land and he was running on the water. He took care of all Octorocks in the river before meeting her in front of the waterfall and he played the song on a flute.

"Thanking for opening the way Fado, I shall go to meet Princess Ruto and King Zora." Navi said going to jump the gap that was the waterfall

Her foot slipped however, she was barely able to grab onto the edge of the stone entrance and pulled herself up.

"I'll come back soon Fado." Navi said running in.

Navi walked into the cavern Fado had opened up for her.

"What happened here?!" Navi yelled, when she saw the Zora Sanctuary was frozen over still, even if Link had defeated Ganonndorf in battle, saving the future time.

Navi?! Is that you?" A feminine voice yelled from the other side of the cavern

"Ruto?!" Navi yelled She ran, but tried not to slip to the other side of the cavern

She found Ruto and the Zora King encased in the same red ice, this is why Navi always had a small jar of Blue Fire with her.

Navi tried pouring some on the red ice, but it wouldn't melt away.

"Navi!" Fado yelled, running to her

Navi then learned how the cavern froze, and a sword can only shatter the ice. Fado began working on all the frozen Zora while Navi looked for the stone. Fado tried freeing the Zoras in the lake first by slicing the ice, but it only left small scratches. He walked over to where there is a rock platform form to stand on. He stabbed his sword into the ice center of the platform and he started to chant a spell for Din's fire on his sword while his eyes started to glow.

"Today is the day the Zoras are free from the curse." Fado said as his sword reacted and fire engulfed the blade melting the around the blade

He used his Fire Blade Strikes on the ice-frozen lake before setting his sights on the king and princess of the Zoras. While Fado began using the Fire Blade on Ruto and the King, Navi continued looking for the stone, when Fado realized something.

"Navi! The Stone...it's in Ruto's Hand!" Fado yelled

"What?! It is?" Navi yelled running back to Fado who was looking at the Zora Sapphire shining in Ruto's Hand

"Okay, how did I not notice that?" Navi asked

Fado used the Blade on the King and Ruto, creating clean slashes through their Ice Prisons.

"Navi? Is that you?" Ruto asked.

"Yes, I need the Sapphire." Navi said.

"It's the only thing that keeps us alive in our Sub-Zero Prisons, if it weren't for this, we'd all be dead." Ruto explained.

"Don't worry, as soon as I complete my Challenge; I'll come back and check on you." Navi said.

"Okay, take the stone and get away fast." Ruto said.

After having receiving the stones, Navi and Fado traveled back to the Deku Tree smiling that they've finally completed Navi's Challenge.

"Navi, there is more to me than you already have seen and you saw me use one of my gift given to me by the Goddesses." Fado said after he stopped walking

"What do you mean Fado?" Navi asked.

"Well, you saw me chant my sword to cast Din's Fire upon it, correct?" Fado said.

"Yes." Navi answered.

"Well, I also have the chanting power of Farore's Wind and Nayru's Love." Fado explained.

"Farore's Wind Chant, it allows my sword to knock back enemies with a powerful wind force when struck with the sword and Nayru's Love gives my sword the power to control itself for a short time as if it were a person itself." Fado explained.

"Those are so cool." Navi said.

He smiled gently at her before he kissed her on the forehead and he made another sword appeared on his back with his other sword forming an X on his back.

"I follow the Goddesses and they told me that I would soon meet the Fairy that guided the Hero of Time. I was also told that I would have to help her with her challenge from the deku tree." He explained and he picked her up and he started to run back to the kokiri forest. After arriving in Kokiri Forest, Fado set Navi down and talked to her some more.

"Now go give the stones to the Deku Tree and return with the challenge's reward." Fado said.

Navi shook his hand, and ran to the Deku Tree.

Navi avoided the other Kokiris as she raced to see the Deku Tree and soon she made it before she was spotted.

"Deku Tree, I have return with the Goron Ruby and Zora Sapphire." Navi said

"Good, thou hast returned safely with thy Stones of Legend. Now, travel to the depths of thy Master Sword." Deku Tree said.

"What does that mean Deku Tree?" Navi asked.

"Traverse to Hyrulian Castle, and travel through the Master Sword, the final challenge await thee there." Deku Tree said.

"Ok, I will." Navi said as she left to meet with fado

"I hope she doth well." Deku Tree said.
15533112.title: Part 2 of the Challenge and the return trip

choices: Something outside of the master sword happens
155331121.content:
So the challenge is to go through the Chasm of the Master Sword?" Fado asked.

"Yes." Navi said as they left for Hyrule Castle.

They ran to the gate leading into Hyrule Town, but fado looked towards the zora lands.

"Come on, we need to hurry." he said thinking about ruto and the king of the zoras.

"Yes! We need to make it to Castle Town before the Sun goes down at least." Navi said.

"Yes, I know that. I live in Hyrule." Fado answered with a dry tone in his voice.

He picked her up before dashing for the bridge and he briefly chanted the spell for Farore's Wind so they can get there faster. They quickly made it into the Hyrulian Castle before being spotted. Fado pulled out his sword and chants the spell for Nayru’s love on his sword to show them the way towards the master sword. Upon reaching the stone where the Master Sword was held, in the throne room of Hyrule Castle, Fado and Navi arrived to see it glowing brightly, even for the dark of night. They walked towards it, and with every step, it began to glow brighter and brighter, till it had lit the entire room.

"So we need to walk through the Master Sword?" Fado asked her recalling the challenge.

"The Deku Tree said there was a Chasm inside the sword itself, so I guess we have to shrink ourselves to find it I guess?" Navi said.

"Shrinking? Maybe that's a power of one of the stones. Let's stand on the sword gently and shrink ourselves." Fado said pulling out the Kokiri Emerald knowing it was the one with the powers of shrink.

They shrunk down, and saw they were getting farther and farther away from each other, as only Navi had actually been shrinking. She found herself in the chasms themselves, and heard a deep voice, obviously not belonging to Fado.

"I see that you are Navi, showeth the stones, to take the Master Chasm Challenge."

"Yes, I have come to take the challenge of the Master Sword." Navi said.

"What is it that I need to do?" She asked.

"Well, all you would need to do is find your way throughout this labyrinth, then take a staircase down further, and do the next challenge. I shall re-communicate with you there."

With a nod, Navi started to walk her way to find her way out of the maze. The Labyrinth was quite confusing; every time Navi would make a turn and would come at a dead end. The "Chasm Master" as she began calling it would just say stuff like "Not that way." or "Wrong Turn". Navi truly felt like a plaything to the Chasm Master as if she was in a battle with him and she is just failing at it.

~Don't give up, Navi!~ Was heard in her mind and it sounded like Fado.

"Fado?" She asked looking around for her friend and ally.

~I'll explain this gift to you after you win this challenge.~ He said as she grew more confident from his words and she nodded with a smile.

With renew determination from his pep talk, she started to run to find her way out of the maze and beat the Chasm Master. Upon Fado's encouragement, Navi flashed by the rest of the chasm and made it to a staircase leading downwards.

"Welcome to the final challenge, welcome your friend and ally, Fado." Chasm Master boomed. Fado materialized next to Navi and he handed Navi one of his Blades.

"You'll need it." He said.

"If you make it to the end of what I call "The Hall of all creatures", then you'll see me, whom you call, the Chasm Master." The voice called.

Fado smiled at navi before use both Din's Fire and Farore's Wind chants on their swords.

"Let's finish this." He said before he lead the charge down the hall

The Labyrinth was quite confusing; every time Navi would make a turn and would come at a dead end. The "Chasm Master" as she began calling it would just say stuff like "Not that way." or "Wrong Turn". Navi truly felt like a plaything to the Chasm Master as if she was in a battle with him and she is just failing at it.

~Don't give up, Navi!~ was heard in her mind and it sounded like Fado

"Fado?" she said looking around for her friend and ally

~I'll explain this gift to you after you win this challenge.~ he said as she grew more confident from his words and she nodded with a smile

With renew determination from his pep talk, she started to run to find her way out of the maze and beat the Chasm Master.

Upon Fado's encouragement, Navi flashed by the rest of the chasm and made it to a staircase leading downwards.

"Welcome to the final challenge, welcome your friend and ally, Fado." Chasm Master boomed. Fado materialized next to Navi and he handed Navi one of his Blades.

"You'll need it." He said.

"If you make it to the end of what I call "The Hall of all creatures", then you'll see me, whom you call, the Chasm Master." The voice called.

Fado smiled at navi before use both Din's Fire and Farore's Wind chants on their swords.

"Let's finish this." he said before he lead the charge down the hall
1553311211111.title: Final challenge Part 1

15533112111111.content:
Fado and Navi slashed through all enemies before them, and came to the place of the Chasm Master.

"Welcome. I see you trashed my minions." the Chasm Master said.

"Alright Fado, I must say you were very skilled; the Goddesses have issued a challenge for me and you. A fight of Pure Strength."

Fado took his 2nd sword from Navi preparing those two. "Well, it's time for my sword, show yourself! Make me believe your strong!" Chasm Master said.

The strongest blade ever appeared in his hand, the Fierce Deity Sword.

Fado chanted Nayru's Love on one of his swords before setting his sights on the Chasm Master.

"You want to see my power? Well, you are going to feel all of it!" he yelled as he and his second blade charged at him with amazing speed from the Farore's Wind chant

"Don't try enchanting your sword! It won't work!" Chasm Master said sending a magic blast from his sword disabling the magic enchantment.

"Huh?" Fado said, before going back and striking an X towards Chasm Master.

"This is gonna be nothing but a sweat drop!" Chasm Master said only holding his sword in the air blocking both swords and creating a knockback to Fado, who was sent flying on his back.

"So, wanna get up and try again?" Chasm Master said smirking.

Fado got up with both swords in his hands and he smiled.

"You didn't say that i can use my chants on myself." Fado said as he charged again

"Don't mess with me Fado! I'll just send a Magic Blast at you, but it'd be like a razor, it'd slice you right open. DO YOU WANT ME TO DO THAT?!" Chasm yelled.

Fado just kept charging.

"Fine. If that's your wish." Chasm said, prepping a Magic Strike, going for the final blow, which will kill Fado.

Fado smiled as run passed the Chasm Master, but he started to run around him until he become a blur without using a chant.

"Din." He said as he stabbed his sword into the ground, but still continue to run around

"Farore." He said as he stabbed another sword in the ground, but across from the first sword

"Nayru." He said as the final sword is in the ground forming a triangle, but they were glowing as the names of the goddesses were being called out

"Grant me the power, courage, and wisdom to beat my opponent." Fado said as the symbol of the triforce appeared on the floor from beams of lights connecting the swords

A sword as long as the three swords combined appeared in his hands and he chanted all three spells on himself without the smile leaving his face.

"I don't run, back down, or fear you. They guide me to Navi and I sensed they have a reason why, but at this moment my job is protect her and kill you. So you better hit me with all you got!" Fado said as he charged at the Chasm Master

"Puh-lease." Chasm said, as a blue Triforce mark appeared on his hand. Chasm began moving swifter and quicker than ever. "You have basically doomed yourself young Fado, because when the spell is enchanted, it also gives me power. But, as I am stronger than you, I will not kill you." Chasm said, appearing behind Fado, and knocking him out with the butt of the Fierce Deity Sword.

"Navi, great work passing the challenge; I believe this is what you came for." Chasm said pulling a necklace from his pocket. Tossing it to Navi, she saw it had symbols of all 4 tribes, The Kokiri, The Goron, The Zora, and the Hyrulians.

"Now, I believe it's time for yours and Fado's departure, so, ai revoiure." Chasm said, snapping his fingers, making Navi and Fado leave his throne room, though he felt the same teleportation too.

When fado left, Chasm Master felt something sliced up his back before he was pushed onto the floor.

"I thought you would say that." A voice said that sounds like fado

"Before you ask how I'm back here, I never left and you beaten a mirage of me. So you want to try me again?" Fado asked him

"Well well well, an intent one are you, just can't admit when your beat!" Chasm said, re-activating his blade, and clashing with Fado once more, finishing the job easily, by shoving the entire sword through his chest. "Now, I can either leave you dying, or I can help heal you." Chasm said, looking straight at the gushing wound, almost covered with blood.

Another Fado appeared behind him and he has his blades at his neck.

"I will only meet death when my job is finished, not sooner. Didn't you say that you wanted to see my real strength?." fado said as he stood facing the chasm master as the other mirage vanished

"No magic; just a battle of wills between two warriors." he said as he took a defensive stance

"Fine, how about we make this a more fair fight. 2 swords each. When one of us falls, we stop, we don't kill." Chasm said.

"Fine with me." Fado said taking a battle stance.

Chasm and Fado ran towards each other swords clashing until both warriors were tired enough and fell.

"So, it looks like the match is a draw." Chasm said.

"Good match." Fado admitted.

"Thanks, why don't you get out of here there really is only room for one powerful soldier in this Master Sword." Chasm said. "Plus, we really shouldn't have fought like enemies I was just asking by the goddesses themselves to challenge you. If you could beat me or tie with my power, then you could continue; we did all that extra fighting out of idiocy." Chasm said.

"Maybe you could come with me?" Fado said helping Chasm up.

"Eh, I don't know. Actually, I haven't seen land in 100 years (You stay immortal if you live in the Master Sword), I'm getting the hell out of this place." Chasm said grabbing Fado and teleporting them outside the Master Sword.

Navi was standing near the Master Sword waiting for Fado to come out.

"Actually, it wasn't." fado said to Chasm Master as they appeared next to navi and he put the sword back where it was

"Let's get out of here." he said to both Chasm master and navi

"Navi." Chasm asked.

"Yes Chasm?" Navi said.

"What will you do now that you have that necklace I gave you?" Chasm asked.

"Well, I plan to continue do what I do best, helping people." Navi said.

"And I plan to assist her in that manner." Fado said.

"Then I shall too." Chasm said.
15533112111111.title: Part 2 of the final challenge

155331121111111.content:
"Chasm! What're you doing outside the Master Sword?!" Link yelled.

"Well Master Link, let's just say times have changed." Chasm said, drawing the Fierce Deity Sword.

"Well, then I believe it's time for our agreement to take place." Link said, drawing the Master Sword.

"Chasm, what is Link talking about?" Navi asked.

"That voice, Navi?" Link asked, walking up to the human forme Navi.

"Yes, anyway Navi, me and the Hero made an agreement when you left that if I ever leave the sword, we'd have our own little duel. Master Sword vs. the Fierce Deity Sword. Hero of Time vs. The Master Sword Spirit." Chasm explained.

Fado stood between the Hero of Time and Chasm facing Link.

"The boy without a fairy grew up into the hero of time." fado said with a smile

"The one who killed the evil being from the desert" he added

Fado moved out of the way, but a smile is on his face.

"I guess you and I will have our battle later in time." he said to link

Chasm drew the Fierce Diety Sword and Link drew the Master Sword. "Well, Let's finish this!" Chasm said, jump attacking towards Link.

"Well, I won't be defeated!" Link said.

"Getting cocky Young Hero!" Chasm said, knocking the Master Sword away from Link's hands with a magic blast

Fado looked at them as link went to pick up his sword, but he motioned navi to leave and return to the Deku Tree.

"Till next time Hero of time." Fado said as he and Navi left them to their duel, but he stopped as she continued onward

"Chasm, next time we duel I will beat you." he said before running to catch up with Navi

"Have Fun trying." Chasm said.

When Fado and Navi left Chasm and Link alone for their duel, Link was waiting for his chance to strike.

Chasm brought forth the sword once more and Link brought the Master Sword out.

"So because I'm the Hero of Time I'll let you have the first strike Chasm." Link said.

"Good. I expected it that way." Chasm said.

Chasm ran almost at the speed of light and charged at Link, but he dodged the strike before strike chasm's back and jumped back away.

"If you have landed that strike, then you would have broken my sword." link said

"That was my goal." Chasm said, lunging at Link again, slashing at him repeatedly with the Deity Sword.

Link used his shield to block some of the attacks before he jumped back.

“Why do you want to break the sword?” he asked before jumped to left and slashed chasm’s side before jumping back again

"I don't, and don't ask me what my goals are Hero of Time." Chasm said, stabbing Link's Mirror shield and throwing it on the ground.

Link rolled over his shield before picking it up as he stood with it in his hand.

“Is that because you don’t know?” he asked shield bashing chasm’s sword away and stabbing him in the chest

Chasm's sword flew back and Chasm's wound closed around the Master Sword before Chasm jumped back pulling the Master Sword out, healing his wound completely.

"So, now I have two swords." Chasm said.

Link pulled out the fixed big goron’s sword and put his shield on his arm so he can use both hands.

“You can’t break this blade.” Link said

Chasm lashed at Link with both the Fierce Deity Sword and Master Sword. Link blocked with his sword and attack bounced off his sword before slashing chasm’s stomach without it getting stuck. Chasm's wound instantly healed and he took a lash at Link slashing the arm covers of Link's tunic off.

“Your attack just bounced off my sword.” He said slashing him from his right shoulder to his left side

Chasm healed his wound and snapped making the room ignite in fire. Link’s tunic changed to the goron’s tunic and slashed chasm with three strikes before taking a defensive stance.

“Why so serious?” he asked

"Don't take movie lines." Chasm said slashing Link's Goron Tunic and making him switch back to the Kokiri.

“Have the feeling that you can’t win?” he asked

"No, I feel I can win, but I need to ignite the field first." Chasm said.

Link smiled before using his version of Din’s fire to hurt chasm by making the fire form a red barrier around him. He did another quick three slashes on him before switching back to defense. Chasm's burns faded away.

"You cannot damage a god."

Chasm dodged at Link, and to his unexpectance, broke the Biggoron Sword. Link had only the Kokiri Dagger to use, which wouldn't last long as it's wooden.

“Chasm, you-“ link started to say, but was interrupted by something like two swords landing in his hands

“He is fighting like gannondorf.” Was heard before link got into his offensive again

"So you figured out my strategy." Chasm said. "Good work Hero of Time."

Just as that, a sword stabbed through his chest, and behind him, was another who looked like Chasm.

"No-one mimics me!" He said, twisting the one sword he had

The Chasm who had the sword in his chest began to get taller, and a lot grosser. The other Chasm withdrew the sword, and the figure (Who later was actually revealed to be Gannondorf), bled out.

"Who are you? What do you want?" the real Chasm said fierce, before throwing the Master Sword back to Link

“Figures it was him.” Was from the swords that were in link’s hands before they stabbed gannondorf and fado appeared with his swords in his hands

“Oh, and I said that.” Navi said running to link

“The part about being a god gave him away.” She added before fado teleported all of them into hyrule field

The marks on fado started to glow in reaction to gannondorf, but he put one of his swords away and pulled the other one out of his chest.

“Gannondork should be dead after the final battle with link.” Fado said before kicking him in the head

"Yes." Chasm said.

"But he did mimic me well."

"You see, I am a god." Chasm said.

"Try stabbing me, right here, in the chest." He pretended to draw a circle around his chest.

Fado let him get up so he could stab him while watching him if he was trying to pull a fast one. The sword stuck into Chasm and Fado pulled it out making the wound bigger. Chasm clapped his hands together and hovered them around the wound, which with an odd blue electricity closed up. Fado beheaded gannondorf since he allowed him to live long enough.

"I'll take that." Chasm said clapping his hands once more trapping Gannon's head in a jar and then he used what appeared to be a cookie-cutting knife to most literally cut a rip in the fabric of time and space and he threw the jarred head in. Chasm repaired the hole, and brushed his hands.

"Now while his head in dissolving in the dark matter controlled by beings from a parralel world, why don't I take you to see my family?" He asked.

“Maybe later, chasm.” Fado said as he and navi ran back to the kokiri forest.
155331121111111.title: Duel: Link vs Chasm [Rewritten]

1553311211111111.content:
As they were putting the Master Sword back together, Navi and Fado ran back to Kokiri Forest for her to finish her challenge.

"Navi, why do you leave link?" he asked her

"The Deku Tree said I couldn't be with a Kokiri who was truly a Hyrulian. I would be dishonored in Kokiri Forest forever." Navi said.

Fado put a hand on Navi's should who in turned around to see him before he hugged her.

"I promise that I will tell you anything and everything about me after we get back to the Deku Tree." He said before they started walking again

Fado Is remembering his past back in Hyrule Town and the fact that he was different from everyone else.

~Maybe They lead me to her because I have someone worth protecting and maybe even love.~ he thought to himself

Navi was looking at fado with concern as they reached the forest and she went inside to get to the deku tree. Fado just waited at the entrance for her to get the reward and he pulled out the emerald.

"The power of the emerald is growth and shrink." he said before putting it back

"Well Navi. Congrats on thy's achievements. I see thy even have the necklace of Chasms. I believe the spirit in the Master Sword gave that to thee?"

Navi nodded.

"Yes, the spirit of the Master Sword did give this to me." She said

"What do I need to do with the Spiritual Stones and the Necklace of Chasms?" navi asked

"Is there another challenge?

"No, all thy needst to do, is give the power of Forest, Earth, and Sea to the Chasm Necklace, and thy shall become one, equal to the goddesses."

"Ok, but do I wear the Necklace after I give it the powers of the Stones?" she asked

"Yes. In order for thy to keep the powers of a goddess, thy must wear the necklace for 15 hours or more. Then thy will truly be granted the powers of growth/shrink, earth manipulation, and water inflation. Later on you may get psychic abilities“

"Ok, I will give the necklace the powers of the stones." Navi said as she left to do what has to be done

Upon exiting the Forest to see Fado, Navi arranged the stones and the necklace, in an order where it all looked like a piece of the Triforce.

"So, this should be how it the Deku Tree explained it to be arranged." Navi said.

Just as Navi put the Zora Sapphire in place, the placement began glowing, and all the prowess of the three stones was absorbed into the necklace of Chasm.

"So, now I put it on, and I have to wear it for 15 hours before I obtain all powers." Navi said.
1553311211111111.title: Back to the Kokiri Forest and the Deku Tree

15533112111111111.content:
As Navi put the necklace on, fado was looking towards the land of the zoras where they have to return to melt the ice and free them.

"Navi, we should see the zoras again and get them out of the ice." he said

"Also, what do you want to know about me?" he asked

"Maybe how you knew of the challenge in the first place." Navi asked.

The two ran towards the Zora home, but Fado couldn't cast Din’s Fire chant for the Fire Sword at all,

"I think the necklace had disabled all chants for the 15 hours." Navi said, but then she burped quietly and an ember fell to her hand.

"Whoa, maybe if you obtain the power of growth from the necklace, then a small Ember Burp could melt the entire cavern."

Fado is thinking of his answer for her question.

"Hmm, I was in a secret cave where you drop down in a hole meditating infront of a small pond. When i looked into the water, i saw you on your challenge and I heard the words of the goddesses to come to your aid." he said

"What is your next question?" he asked her

"I really don't have any more though I guess I can ask how swords keep magically appearing when you want them to it honestly scares me a bit." Navi asked.

"Its one of my powers and it's quite a useful one." he said

"Do you want to know how I came to be who I am?" he asked

"Sure. Go ahead and tell me." Navi said.

"It was during my youth when Queen Zelda was still Princess Zelda. When I was young, the other kids were acting different around me so I had little to no friends growing up and only my parents loved me. One day, I stayed inside not wanting to deal with them; but there was a knock on the door and my mother opened it to see Princess Zelda at the door wearing a cloak to keep herself from being noticed. She asked if she could talk with me alone and mom gave a smile before going back to what she was doing before. Zelda looked at me and noticed that there was something special about me, but she smile and I looked at her confused. She put a hand on my forehead and she closed her eyes. I thought she was tired, but she was thinking and I felt something warm from her hand. Something on the back of her hand glowed and she opened her eyes. She showed me the mark on her hand was the triforce of wisdom and she said that the goddesses chose me for something important like how they chose the Hero of Time to kill the evil being from the desert. I smiled and I gave her a hug while maybe crying a little, but she just hold me and let me cry into her. Soon I felt better and she just smiled and rubbed my head. Just as I was getting older, I heard someone talking to me in my mind or in my dreams so I remember that it might have been one of the Goddesses talking to me. During one of my dreams, I felt someone or something keeping me warm and showing me courage while I felt someone's love towards me and it was someone other than my mother. I think later on Princess Zelda came by again to see me and she brought Link so she must have told him about me. He smiled and took me out into the backyard to show me some swordplay, but he put his hand on my heart and it glowed the same as hers. When I got old enough, I went to buy a sword and find a teacher for lessons, but I felt someone behind me and it was him again and he took me to his personal training ground where he taught me to fight with a sword." he explained

"Interesting, so that's what my companions have done in the past few years." Navi said.

The two kept chatting in the iced cavern until 15 hours were surprisingly up.

"Soon who I was then became who I am now." He said as he revealed his face, which was light tan, sea green eyes with some blue, and fire red hair

"Well that's, no offense but a little odd. As you know I'm actually fairy, but I took this challenge to see the world at a different angle." Navi said.

Fado pulled out two of his swords and stabb them in the ice lake before stabbing a third sword making a triangle.

"Din, Farore, and Nayru." he said as the swords reacted by being engulfed in flames and his final sword appeared and the three swords made the triforce symbol by gold beams of light

He stabbed the final sword into the center and he meditated before chanted all of the chants at the same time creating the Goddess Spell chant which gives the sword and caster invincibility from both magical and physical attacks. The sword is Twilight Gold and glows from the power of the Goddesses, but he pulled the sword out before it vanished and he stood in the center still facing ruto and her father

"Din, grant me the power to free the zoras form their prison." he said as he pull the other two blades out only one vanishing and he grabbed the red fire sword before stabbing it in the center gathering power

The Mark of Din glows on his left shoulder and he pulled the sword before he moving his hand along the blade making it engulfed in flames.

"Fire Storm Barrage." fado said as he teleported to both ruto and her father slicing the ice freeing them

He stabbed the ice lake and melted it with one grand strike, but he let the blade stay in the rock platform for it to cool down.

"I think I'm going to rest for a minute while you talk to them, Navi." fado said before sitting next to his blade
15533112111111111.title: Return to the Zoras

choices: On the way to his second test
155331121111111111.content:
"Alright." Navi said, walking off to go speak with Ruto.

As she left to speak with ruto, Fado went into a meditative position and fell into a sleep like trance. His sword soon cool down before returning itself into its sheath and he started to meditate to clear his thoughts and emotions. The marks of Nayru, Din, and Farore started faintly glow while during his meditation.

~How am I going to get stronger to beat Chasm?~ he asked himself in his mind

~Maybe the Goddesses can show me the right direction.~ he thought

While he tries to contact with the Goddesses, Navi and Ruto are talking.

"So, that Chasm fellow you talked about. Who is he?" Ruto asked Navi, sitting in a waterfall coaxed throne room.

"He's a guy that beat Fado. He even beat the Hero of Time." Navi said.

"Well that's impressive." Ruto said.

~Actually, that fado was a mirage and we tied before we appeared to you, Navi.~ Fado said in their minds

"I'm happy that we got you and the rest of the zoras free of the ice." Navi said with a smile

"True. I thank you on behalf of the Zora Kingdom, say hi to Link for me when you get the chance." Ruto said, still obsessed over the Hero of Time since the Zora Sapphire was more an engagement ring to her.

She nodded with a smile before she gave ruto a hug before and walk to fado who was still meditating in his trance state. He sensed her near him and he nodded letting her know that he knows that she was there.
155331121111111111.title: Navi and ruto talking

1553311211111111111.content:
Soon fado finished his meditation and stood up before smiling at Navi.

"We might as well leave, Navi. I think it might be best if we went somewhere to test your new powers." Fado said getting circulation back into his legs

Navi and Fado left the Zora Caverns, and encountered with Chasm.

"Oh, why hello you two. I saw your achievement of un-freezing the Zora Caverns." He said letting his hair flow in the wind.

"Hello Chasm." Fado said, gripping a sword ready to pull it out of its sheath.

"Watch Out! Watch Out! Watch Out!" Someone said, before running into Chasm.

The Boy quickly got up, and apologized to Chasm.

"Watch where you’re going kid!" Chasm snapped at the boy.

"Heh sorry mister, I was kind of in a rush; I received a message from...wait...your me!!" The kid yelled, pointing at Chasm.

"What kind of hell are you speaking?!" Chasm yelled.

"Just listen to this. I received a message from the Goddesses, saying my past form has been released from the Master Sword." The boy explained.

"Damn, it looks like your right, I guess I should stop messing around, we are Leoni after all." Chasm said, reaching for a handshake.

The boy gladly took his hand, and Chasm transferred from his place on Earth, to the boy's body.

"Yes, It's happening; I’m returning to my real age." The Boy said. Fado and Navi saw as Chasm was making the boy named "Leoni" grow older, almost to his age.

When the transformation was complete, Leoni looked just like Chasm.

"So, I'm betting your Chasm's Friends?" Leoni asked.

"I guess you could say that." Fado said.

"Well, I'm Leoni, but call me Leon." Leoni said.

"I'm Fado and this is Navi." Fado said gesturing to navi who nodded

"So, chasm was your past form." he said still ready to pull out one of his swords

"Yes, from what I've now gathered, how's about you and I have a little clash, sword to sword, no magic, no copies, no anything, just a one-on-one match." Leon suggested.

Fado smiled before walking from navi and a few feet from from him with a smile.

"Alright Leon, but don't underestimate me." fado said pulling out of his sword and getting into a stance

Leon did the same, taking a few steps back, and drawing the now normal sword, which was once the Fierce Deity Sword.

"Let us begin then." Leon said charging at Fado directly

"Foolish." Fado said rebounding with his sword making sparks fly into the air.

"Was it now?" Leon said bringing the sword up making Fado's go flying.

It landed 3 feet away and Fado scrambled to get it, but Leon tripped him up and it was officially over.

"What is it with you using that move?" Fado asked.

"Haha, sorry, it's kind of a skill I made up. Chasm just used it." Leon said.

Leon helped Fado up and Fado picked his sword up sheathing it.

"The three of us should head to the temple of light since I have a feeling that is where we should be." Fado said as he lead both navi and leon to the temple of light
1553311211111111111.title: On the way to his second test

choices: Fight: Fado and Navi Vs Gannondorf and Girahim
15533112111111111111.content:
"Well, we're here now Fado. Why did you lead us here?" Leon asked.

"Young Warriors." 3 Majestic voices called, when the three golden goddesses came down from the Sky.

"I am Din." the Goddess with red aura flowing off her said.

"I am Farore." the Goddess with green aura flowing off her said.

"And I am Nayru." the Goddess with blue aura flowing off her said.

Fado bowed in respect to them as navi followed and leon did the same.

"I remember you three from my dreams during my youth and I'm happy to follow you three." Fado said with his head low and he had a smile that they couldn't see

"As am I." Leon said.

"Young Warriors, we have a challenge for you to accomplish." Din said.

"Yes, and it involves quite a bit of swordplay." Farore spoke.

"It will be extremely challenging." said Nayru.

Fado turned his head to look at navi and he nodded.

"The harder it is, the stronger I will be." fado said

"And maybe I can wield that final blade when I am strong enough." he said as he was flexing his hands

Fado made all three swords appeared out of their sheaths without using his hands and they stabbed themselves into the ground before the goddesses. The fourth and final blade appeared before them in his hands and walked to them with his head still hanging down.

"I made this sword for you three and I wish for you to keep it till I am strong enough to wield it." fado said as he kneeled before them holding his sword above his head

"We shall do as you wish, but if we do not give it to you immediately after the challenge, do not question." Din, Farore, and Nayru said in unison.

Simultaneously, they snapped their fingers and the trio found themselves to be within a dark void.

Fado's three swords appeared in their sheaths and stayed on his back.

"Is it just against us?" Fado asked

"No, it's against all of us." Link said, appearing behind them.

"King Link! Queen Zelda!" Fado yelled out loud.

"There is us too, don't forget our names, I am Girahim, servant of the Destruction God, Demise." A Malicious voice said.

"And I am Gannondorf, ruler of all things evil, once ruler of Hyrule itself." A second said.

"Gannondorf! Girahim!" Link said, drawing the Master Sword.

"Cool it down Hero of Time." Din said.

"I believe we should introduce ourselves now girls." Nayru said. "Nayru is correct." Farore said.

"I am Din, Goddess of Fire and Earth." Din said.

"I am Nayru, Goddess of Water and Love." Nayru said.

"And I am Farore, Goddess of Forest and Feelings." Farore said.

"And whoever gets through this challenge! Gets to face us three Goddesses in battle!" All 3 said joyfully, as if they were cheerleaders.

"These are the pairings." Din said, pretending to put on a pair of glasses.

"Fado with Navi."

"Gannondorf with Girahim." Nayru said.

"Link with Zelda." Farore said.

"And Leon by himself." All 3 Goddesses said.

"What?! Why am I by myself?!" Leon yelled.

"Isn't it obvious enough Leon, you have 2 souls inside of you. So technically, you aren't by yourself." Chasm said.

"Oh, and just so you know Fado, you can only use one of your swords." Din said.

"So, swords go bye-bye!" Nayru and Farore said, making 2 of Fado's Swords disappear, leaving him only 1.

"Begin!" All 3 Goddesses said, snapping their fingers, making the group of Heroes and Villans appear in a Chasm-like Maze.

"This should be no sweat for us; I was made in a Chasm." Chasm said.

"Navi, let’s do our best to win and see what powers you can use." Fado said to his partner and she nodded as they ran looking for their first fight

"Okay." Navi replied, as the two went off to confront the Villainous Duo.

Fado's inner strength started to build already when he was thought of those two and the anger he felt inside. the blade on his back reacted to him and a red glow came from the sword, but he started to calm his mind and think of a plan for when they will meet.

"Navi, don't underestimate them or anyone else; but i trust you that you will guard my back." he said calmly and he showed her a smile

"You can trust me." Navi said, rushing behind Fado, but they had run into Leon first.

"So, whoever finishes gets to face the goddesses, I'm sorry Fado, but I won't let you pass me and Chasm up!" Leon said, drawing the Fierce Deity Sword, which had become so upon Chasm talking with Leon.

"I got you!" Navi said, putting a Psychic Shield before Fado to protect him from Leon's Attack.

"Now let's do...this!" Navi said, raising her and Fado on pillars coming from Earth.

Leon touched the pillar, and sensed it was still weak.

"A Simple Strike should take both of these down." Leon said, doing a spin attack, slashing through the pillars causing them to fall towards the ground and Navi was worried as her powers had to regenerate leaving them defenseless.

They would've have died, but Leon decided to create a Magic Barrier that would not only keep them locked up, but would keep them safe.

"Ta-Ta." Leon said, leaving to go find Link, Zelda, Girahim, and Gannondorf.

Fado smiled before another pair of Navi and Fado appeared outside of the barrier.

"This won't stop me." Fado said as he and his mirage drew thieir swords

Both fados concentrated their power into thier sword of Din before slicing the barrier to pieces. The Mark of Din was glowing and his eyes were glowing red with fire.

"Go fool Leon and Chasm." He said to the mirages as he and Navi left for gannondorf and girahim

Fado handed Navi a potion and it was blue.

"Drink that; it will help with your powers." he said as he put her on his back before dash teleporting to his next opponents

"Navi, focus on using one power for the moment like that psychic wall you did." he said
15533112111111111111.title: Test #2

155331121111111111111.content:
"Wow, you really are a fool Fado." Leon said, coming out from behind the corner.

"Man, I never thought he'd be dumb enough." Chasm said, as the two began to laugh.

What Fado didn't know, is that the barrier had infected his swords with a virus, which would make them go wild whenever used. Leon eventually found Fado fighting (And losing hysterically to) Girahim.

"Oh, well to bad I have to kill them all at a moment's notice." Leon said, rolling his eyes, trapping them all in an unbreakable barrier, something not even Fado's 4th Sword could handle.

Leon could see inside the ball of unbreakable steel and noticed Girahim was shocked and had Fado and Navi by the collars of their shirts and was yelling at them.

"Navi, could you possibly use the psychic power to break the shield?" Fado said.

"Sorry, but that won't work. If you try attacking the ball itself, you'll activate the gunpowder within, making the ball explode. It also nullifies your abilities, enchantments, and powers." Leon said

"I knew you were behind it." Fado said, trying to punch at the wall.

Navi and Girahim held him back though, yelling "DO YOU HAVE A FREAKING DEATH WISH?!.”

Leon smirked at the trapped trio, and went off to find the remaining trio of Gannondorf, Link, and Zelda.

“Hey, dork.” Was heard as another fado and navi appeared before them and he drew his unaffected blade towards them

“Did you really think I would fall for another trick?” the real fado said with a smile and hundreds of fado mirages charged at leon

"You have to give me some credit." he said before sending a mirage to kill girahim who was still inside the trap

"He is nothing, but a weakling." fado said referring to girahim

"If I can't win with power, then outsmart them." he added before his hands glowed and a flash blinded leon and chasm
