Fado and navi left them fighting in a maze of mirages and illusions that they can't win for them to get away.

"THAT'S IT!!" Leon and Chasm yelled.

"Time to activate the true power."

Leon floated into the air and orbs flew to his body, absorbing every being within. Girahim, Gannondorf, Link, Zelda all gone; their powers were absorbed and made Leon Giant. He used his now amplified power to trap every Fado and Navi in a ball and made it not only inescapable, but also unbreakable. Shrinking back to his normal size, the ball containing the 2 shrunk with him eventually to the size of a mere keychain. Leon returned the souls of the people, but the Goddesses took them as losers, as did they with Navi and Fado. Leon found the way to their chambers and he and Chasm prepared for the battle.
155331121111111111111.title: More Fighting

choices: In the Chamber of the Goddesses
1553311211111111111111.content:
~Taking this too seriously, young warrior.~ was heard in leon's mind and the mark of Nayru glowed in his mind coming from fado's mind and it didn't sound like him

"I maybe weak right now, but that won't mean I won't stop trying to get stronger." was heard through out the maze

"Fire, Earth, Water, Light, Shadow, Wind, Spirit and Forest." Was heard

"There is always a will to win and I have Heart, Will, and the POWER!" was shouted and the all three Marks of the goddesses were glowing strongly

Orb of the elements appeared and a portal opened at the entrance of the chambers with the other teams except for girahim walking through including Navi and Fado with his marks glowing and his eyes glowing gold. The portal closed, but fado took gannondorf out with a single slice of his sword and pushed into the orb of light. With quick speed, he knocked link and zelda out with a hit of a pressure point.

"I know why I was sent to Navi." fado said in a deeper voice like he was older and more wise

"I will not just fight to protect her, but if anything happened to her I would..." he said not finishing his sentence

"I care for her and maybe even love her if the time comes."

Fado focused his sight on Leon and Chasm and he rammed into him with full power and speed.

"I don't care how many times I have been defeated or lost to someone like you. I will keep trying no matter the risk." he said as Leon was sent flying into a wall and the final sword appeared in fado's hand

"Chasm, one final clash before I admit that I honorably lost to you." fado said taking a stance with a smile

"Leon, let me take over this battle to fulfill his wish." Chasm said.

"Yeah." Leon said, letting Chasm take over.

Chasm drew 2 Fierce Deity Swords from his back, and morphed them together, "Creating, The Soul Spinner Sword." Chasm said.

The Sword then transported the dead bodies of Girahim and Gannondorf to the battlefield, and sucked the remaining soul out of them.

"Depending on the souls it absorbs, depends on how much I can split it, so now, SPLIT." Chasm said.

The Sword split into two, one having dark energy flowing through it (Gannondorf), and the other giving Fado and Navi an uncomfortable feeling (Girahim).

"But remember Fado. We're friends, not enemies, let's not kill each other, but at least take the other out like you did Link and Zelda." Chasm said.

The orbs of the elements moved circling around Fado and Navi. the orbs shrink down enough to look like they can fit in your hands and they lined up before in a small quick flash resulting a sword is made.

"Sage's Sword and True Goddess Sword." Fado said wielding both swords with ease and used the orb of water to wake both zelda and link up to see this fight

"Chasm, you and i are almost the same." the older voice said

"We have the power that our younger forms can't reach yet, but young fado shows promise as leon too, but both fado and navi need training." it said before fado charged at him again before teleporting and sliced up his back

"If the Goddesses will allow both Navi and Fado to be trained by them, then they just might reached their full power and maybe then we will meet in battle." it used fado's voice to asked the goddesses as it used the body to ready another attack

"Knowing the best, could also mean acting the cockiest." Chasm said, repairing his back with little of his magic.

Then he charged at Fado and stabbed both swords into his stomach, truly only creating enough blood for a flesh wound, but could knock any normal human out instantly.

"Navi. I recommend shielding you, Link, and Zelda." Chasm said.

Navi did as told, Chasm pulled 2 swords from Fado's Back.

"Explosion Swords huh, perfect." Chasm said. Chasm put a shield around himself using the remainder of the Fierce Deity Sword, and shoved the swords into the ground

Creating an Explosion that would knock out and petrify Fado for quite a long while. The Explosion, knowing where to go, also struck the remainder of false Fados on the floor. Just as a filler, Chasm turned Fado's lower body (Waist down) into stone.

Fado melted into a puddle before turning black and moved away before reforming into his normal body.

"Mirage Chain Explosion." fado said as the fado mirage exploded around Chasm until both chasm and fado were caught in the blast of the last big explosion

"Fire Shield." was heard from fado protecting navi who was shielding link and zelda

"I know i have long and hard path to get stronger, but the first to know is when i am beaten." fado said crossing his two swords and letting them vanish back to where the goddesses keep them

Fado show chasm a smile before pulling out his sword of Din and stabbed him in the heart. that was a mirage which exploded and the real fado returned to normal before with the marks's glow fainting, but he fainted and fell next too navi, link, and zelda.

~Fado is not dead, but sleeping from the drain of his energy and his will is adamant while burns like a fire never going out. What he said is truth about him and his feelings about Navi is true as well, but maybe the Goddesses can show both Fado and Navi the path they need to take. Fado knows that he relies on his powers and his chants alittle more than on his own blades, but that will change in time during this training. Chasm and Leon, do your best as warriors.~ The older voice said using fado’s mind power before disappearing and fado started to sleep

"So, I guess this battle was a draw." Chasm said, removing the sword from his chest then healing the wound.

"Only because I say it is." fado said in his own voice in his sleep

Fado." Navi said as she lay his head on her lap while he sleep

The sword reappeared in its sheath.

"Chasm, fight hard my friend."

"For your honor, I shall Fado." Chasm said, smiling

Navi is looking at fado before he kissed her on the lips and he opened his eyes halfway.

"Navi, would you be dishonored by staying with me?" he asked

"Of course not." Navi answered.

"Ahh, just say ya love eachother already, If Navi isn't gonna come along to try and become a Goddess, then I have some Goddesses to battle." Chasm said, beginning to walk off.

"Navi, you should go with him so you can become a goddess." fado said

"I'll stay here with those two." he added before he tried to get up, but he just made another mirage

"Take him with you, he will be my eyes and ears." he said as they left to follow chasm

"No, the real you should be coming." Chasm said, slashing the mirage to pieces.

"Just watch this." Chasm swung the Fierce Deity Sword, sending Magic Pulses to Fado's Body.

"There Healing Pulses, it'll heal your body faster than any treatment or medicine. Until your legs are strong enough to walk, you'll just have to deal with being shrunken with Navi. It'll be the Easiest way for you to travel." Chasm explained, as Fado shrunk, and was placed in Navi's Hands, still glowing from the Healing Pulses.

~I'll get my chance later.~ fado thought

~Sure you will.~ Chasm thought in reply.

Fado was thinking of something when he looked at his hands and he remembered something that he trained himself to use his body as a weapon.

~I'm not out of tricks yet.~ he thought as he did the stances

~Please Fado. You're shrunken in Navi's hands. If anything, you should just lay down. If you tried to kill me at that size, not even your swords could dent me or Navi.~ Chasm thought.

Fado just smiled before shaking his head.

"My one last surprise and its for later." fado said

"Just make sure that navi doesn't get hurt, chasm." he added before laying down

~I'll make sure that Navi stays safe, but that would mean I'd also be in charge of your protection, because if something happens to Navi, it could happen to you as well.~ Chasm thought.

~I still have some powers left to use and size won't matter. I'm more concerned about navi if you ask me if i have a death wish, then i guess i will some day; but it won't be today.~ fado said ready to trigger one of his other powers that he kept secret

~Kay then.~
1553311211111111111111.title: Final battle?

choices: Fado Snaps and death of a friend
15533112111111111111111.content:
"Navi, is there some place safer to keep me in case you need to use your hands?"

"Maybe here would be good, but don't be getting any ideas now." Navi said, slipping the injured Fado into one of her open breast pockets.

Fado was smiling and shaking his head.

"I would never do anything of the sort, though chasm might since he hasn't seen the opposite sex in 100 years." fado joked

~WHY WOULD YOU SAY THAT?! Even though that would probably go down, but just if she's pretty! NOW DON'T SAY ANYMORE I'LL TEAR YOU LIMB FROM LIMB!~

~Chasm, it was a joke.~ fado said

~Well it wasn't funny.~ Chasm said, walking further ahead.

Soon they are in the Chamber of the Goddesses.

"Well well well." Din said.

"It appears that 2..." Farore continued.

"Have come to be our snacks." Nayru said.

"Whatever do you mean by that my Goddesses." Chasm asked, Leon asking the same thing in their mind.

"Yeah, what do you mean?" Navi asked.

"Whoever loses to us becomes our prey, but don't worry we don't eat our victims to kill. We eat them to have fun even if they do die in the process." Nayru answered.

"What?!" Chasm, Leon (In Mind), Navi, and even Fado yelled.

"That's right, we eat whoever loses to us, we're Goddesses, so we never lose." Din said.

"And since Warriors come here every day to challenge us." Farore added.

"We get about 3 to 5 meals a day, depending on how many come at once." The three Goddesses said.

"So, how would you eat said prey?" Chasm asked.

"Oh, if we're feeling lazy, we would just shrink them down, and then chomp them up." Nayru said, making a chomping motion.

"Or if we're feeling eccentric, we grow to Giantesses, and either step on (then eat) or just eat them straight up." Din said.

"I mainly maim my victims, making sure they're nothing but a blood splotch, then I lick their remains off of our spotless floor." Farore said.

"And, we're feeling quite eccentric today, so say goodbye to your lives, 'heroes'. Because we..always..win." Din said.

The trio saw as the 3 grew to Giantesses, and saw as everything on them except their gold bracelets and anklets busted off, leaving them completely in the nude.
15533112111111111111111.title: In the Chamber of the Goddesses

155331121111111111111111.content:
Fado was surprised to hear this and was not believing what he was hearing from the three people he followed without question till now.

"I followed you without question." fado said and his anger is raising

Fado jumped out of the pocket as he triggered the power that he had ready and he returned to his normal size. His body is glowing as his other two swords appeared on his back and symbols of the trifoce appeared on his shoulders, hands, forehead, chest, and back.

"The only thing I question is YOU!" Fado yelled as he vanished before punching all three in the face sending them back a few feet

"YOU THREE ARE NO GODDESSES!" he yelled before hammering on them and send them into the wall behind them

"Chasm we fight together." he said before teleporting to navi

"Navi, you have the power of a goddess; become one I'll buy you time so you can." fado said before kissing her again on the lips and pulled two swords out

"You say you never lose. Well, that is going to change and no one is going to be eaten while I'm around." fado said as he flex his muscles

"Child, you'd best take back what you said about us before I smash you like a bug!" Din growled.

"I will not. You three are goddesses as much as I and Chasm rest from battling. And that's barely ever." Fado said.

"Fine. Chasm will you fight with me?" Fado said.

"Always." Chasm said.

"Me too!" Leon said within Chasm's mind.

"You shall die by the hand of my flame if you insult me and my sisters once more." Din growled at the two.

"Now, apologize before I barbecue you!"

"Never." Fado said.

"So, DIE!" Din yelled, launching a fireball the size of a boat at Fado.

Fado kept looking stern, but was somewhat scared.

"Fado. REMOVE YOURSELF!" Chasm yelled, jumping in the way of the fireball.

"Din. Farore. Nayru. Shameful. Very Shameful." Chasm said, voice now deeper.

Din, Farore, Nayru gasped at this.

"Father?!" They all yelled.

"Yes. I am your creator, and if necessary, I will remove you from Hyrule permanently." Chasm yelled.

"No, I'm afraid that's not the case Dad." Nayru said, vanquishing Din's Fireball, and gripping Chasm forcefully.

"What will you do?" Chasm asked.

"This." Nayru said.

Nayru stuck out her long tongue, being pointed like a fairy, and dropping Chasm onto it.

"Down you go 'Dad', you've become my tasty meal." Nayru said, chomping Chasm to bits, maiming every last bit, but creating a small blood splotch on her tongue.

"Mmm, Dad was delish; you guys should've tried him." Nayru said, burping out some remains of Chasm.

Navi began to cry at the sight of this, and Fado stressed tears, but fought them back.
155331121111111111111111.title: Fado Snaps and death of a friend

1553311211111111111111111.content:
~I may be dead, but I won't make it in vain. Fado, allow me to give you all these.~ Chasm said to Fado in his mind, handing him the Fierce Deity Sword, The Soul Swords, and the blades strongest next to the Fierce Deity Sword, the Time Deity Sword, and the Space Deity Sword.

~Chasm, what is the name of their father?~ Fado asked hoping he would hear him

"I felt the warmth of love from all three of you, was taught law and wisdom from Nayru and Zelda, courage and strength from Link and Farore, Din showed me the will to fight while I was training" Fado said as his marks glowed brightly this time

"You three are not the ones I followed since I first started out on my journey." fado said as he made his swords and the swords that Chasm gave him appeared around him floating in the air

"I'll say it again: YOU ARE NO GODDESSES!" Fado yelled and the swords stabbed themselves into the ground making the triforce symbol appear on the ground with his three main swords, but he grabbed his final two swords and put them on his back before putting all three deity swords in the center of the symbol

Fado had drew the two soul swords and he regained his usual smile.

"People keep asking me if I have a death wish and this is what i said; Yes i have one, but untill that day and time comes. I will keep fighting no matter who is my way. that includes you three self-proclaimed goddesses of NOTHING!" Fado yelled the ask part before chanting the spell for chasm and leon's souls to be in the soul swords

He felt power coming from the three deity swords and he just had an idea. He hand Navi the soul swords before using one of his secret powers on the six swords in the symbol of the triforce.

"Time for a Power upgrade." fado said as the Symbol started to glow brighter and brighter

A flash happened and everyone was blinded for a moment, but the Symbol on the floor was change into the Deity Triforce and the Swords of the Goddesses were upgraded to the Deity Swords. Fado pulled the fierce deity sword and put it with his swords before pulling up the Time and Space Deity Swords.

"Navi, let chasm and leon help you become a goddess." he said with his smile and charged at his opponents without fear

"I will use whatever power I can." Navi said.

~Hey Fado." Chasm and Leon said to Fado.

~You answered.~ Fado replied.

~Of course, we're all friends. Remember how I said I was their father?~ Chasm said.

~Yes Chasm.~ Fado said.

~Well I being their father, they had power-hungry lifestyles and they would hate me for having more power than them. Then my wife, Gaia, decided to give them their powers of the Triforce so they would leave and leaves Us alone.~ Chasm said.

~So, you were the Ultimate Being already?~ Fado asked.

~Duh, whoever else coulda given these girl their original powers.~ Chasm said.

~Now Fado, I must thank you for summoning my piece of the Triforce, the Deity Triforce. This way I can create a soulless army of soldiers to fight with you. If you want me to help. My power is basically yours x100 at the right time.~ Chasm said.

~Do you want that, or can you and Navi use Mine and Leon's Souls to defeat them.

Fado just kept smiling at them, but he pulled his sage's sword and schtick it in the middle of the symbol. Another flashed blinded them and another triforce appeared in the center of the deity triforce and the sword was upgraded to the elemental goddess, but the symbol was Gaia's piece of the triforce that is on the blade.

~I'll use whatever you can give, chasm. Can your wife help navi's growth as a goddess since I just brough her side of the triforce into yours?~ fado thought as he stabbed the goddesses in the hearts (if they had one)

"Din is weak to Nayru, but she is weak against Farore and she is weak to fire." Fado said as he pulled out his swords after stabbing them and backing away from them

Fado teleported to Navi's side and was ready for another attack, but he triggered another power.

"Which one is the real Fado?" was heard before millions and millions of fados appeared filling the chamber and they charged at the goddesses

Fado smiled, but he turned to navi and pushed her out of the chamber.

"Navi, go get link and Zelda and inform them of this little mess of the brats posing as goddesses." Fado said before hitting a fireball towards farore and he handed her the fierce deity sword

"Give that to link and I'll keep them busy." he said before she ran off to get more help

Fado pushed a water blast at din before reflecting a tree to stab into nayru.

"I bet Hylia would have been a better goddess to follow than you three." fado said running into his army of mirages

~Gaia can help you, in fact, she's even here now.~ Chasm said as 3 Giant Mirage People appeared in the sky

Every Fado looked up, and recognized Chasm as the male.

"It's good to see you again Chasm." Gaia, the female figure said.

"Thank you, my dear wife and it's good to see you as well Hylia." Chasm said.

"Hello Dad, I was wondering when you'd return to the realm of Gods and Goddesses." Hylia said, hugging Chasm.

"Now, for you three." Gaia said, giving a deathly glare to Din, Farore, and Nayru.

"Yes. As Goddesses, I would expect more from my sisters." Hylia lectured.

Chasm bent down to the real Fado, saying "I heard what you said about my daughter Hylia, that would be a good choice. Though she may be ditzy, she's probably the best choice out of our family."

"Yes Chasm." Fado said.

"Now, about your punishment." Gaia said.

"As if you could ever punish us Mom, we're so powerful. Not even a God or Goddess could beat us, that also mean you Dad and Little Sister." Farore said.

"Ah Farore, still cocky as ever. I think it's time for your punishment to arrive. Navi! Could you come in here please?" Gaia called.

Navi then ran in with Link and Zelda. But Link had looked completely different.

"It looks like the true worthy wielder of the Fierce Deity Sword has arrived." Chasm said.

"Back to Navi, as long as you are willing to become our child, I have the ability to make you a Goddess, do you wish for that?" Gaia asked.

Navi looked at fado, link, and zelda; but mostly at fado before she nodded.

"Yes, please. I want to help people and protect those who I care about." Navi said
1553311211111111111111111.title: Fado's power upgrade and family reunion

15533112111111111111111111.content:
"Fine." Chasm said.

"Since we see the determination in your eyes, Hylia, do the honors of giving at least a quarter of your power to this young girl." Gaia said.

"Yes Mom, anything to help defeat Big Sisters." Hylia said, as she picked Navi up, and energy from Hylia's luxurious hair flowed into Navi's Body.

"Welcome to the family Navi. You're now one of my Goddess Children." Chasm and Gaia said.

"Yes Mom and Dad." Navi said, shakily calling them that, since she knew Chasm for a while, and had only met Gaia, now she was calling them both her parents.

"Now Navi." Gaia said.

"I believe it's time for you to defeat your older sisters."

Navi nodded with a smile, but she looked at fado.

"Hey don't forget about us." Fado said before having himself, link and zelda teleport next to Navi

Fado looks at Zelda and looks at Hylia and looks at chasm confused.

"Chasm, was Zelda at one point Hylia?" he asked before drawing out the Great Fairy Sword for Navi to wield

Navi looked her necklace before calming her mind and she grew to the same size as her older sisters, but her clothes are still intact.

"Mom, thank you for this wonderful gift." she said before she hugged her

"Yes Zelda was. But she had decided it was best for both her and Hylia to become separated people. So thus Hylia was born upon Zelda's wish

"Yes. What Chasm says is true." Zelda said.

"Hey Hylia." Navi asked.

"Yeah sis?" Hylia asked.

"Mind helping me take our sisters down?" Navi asked.

"Sure sis." Hylia said.

Fado looked at his mirages fighting and his smiled before he triggered another of his powers.

"All Fado mirages, combine." he said before jumping off and there was this mass of black

The mass of black took form of a human and it grew to the size of Navi and the other goddesses and chasm. when the color came back, it was a giant fado and the real fado is shielded by the mirages.

"Link, you want to join in here?" fado asked him as he had his hand close to him

"You think I'm going to let you have all the fun, girls." Fado said drawing out his final two blades and was ready for a fight, but Navi took him out of the body and handed him to her mother

"You did more than enough, fado and I wish that I could repay you for your help since I first met you; but this is my fight now with my sister, Hylia." she said to him before she kissed him and took a stance that fado has done with a smile

"Keep him safe, Mom. I love him." she said as she and hylia got ready for a fight

With no weapons at all, Navi and Hylia pushed back the three goddesses who acted no more like Children.

"Dad, now's your chance to finish them." Hylia said.

"No, I want you both to finish this, here are my blades."

"Wait." Fado said before using the power of the spirit giving some power to navi and Hylia

"Show them the Spirits of the Fallen." Fado said as the Goddesses were chained to the wall so Navi and Hylia has the chance before he fell asleep in Gaia's hands

With Fado's power helping them and two blades each their hands, Navi and Hylia finished their older sisters off.

~Chasm, can you explain Demise and Gannondorf to me and their relation?~ fado thought

~Well Fado, you may not believe this; but Gannondorf is actually the true reincarnation of Demise, same powers, almost same sword, just different entities.~ Chasm said communicating with Fado.

~What about keeping your fallen daughters in the master sword?~ he asked

~That doesn't happen. What happens is when it's I guess you could call it "their time" they just let it happen, and have no regrets, but as me and Gaia say, every death of a Goddess plants a new seed for another.~ Chasm said to Fado.

~Who was it that I felt in my dreams when I was younger? was it them or someone else?~ fado asked feeling like a fool and betrayed

~Well, that all depends on who you think it was. I'll just be able to confirm who it was if you can give the first guess.~ Chasm said.

While talking, Navi and Hylia were working on finishing up the brats Chasm and Gaia dare called their children.

~Also young child.~ Gaia thought to Fado

~Don't have the feeling of betrayal.~

~My wife is correct, do not feel betrayed or foolish. The only thing that's foolish was that thought, we'll always be here, for friends and family.~ Chasm said.

Fado's body is moving on its own and it's in meditative position while he is still sleeping. He was recalling the dreams and the memory of the feeling from them.

~Thank you both.~ fado said as his body smiled feeling better

~Hmm, At first I thought it was them considering I have their marks on my body; but was it any of the three, Din, Nayru, or Farore? I'm just being sure.~ Fado said

~Who knows, it may have been our daughter Hylia's mark.~ Chasm said.

~Could it have been? We did see Hylia's Mark in the sky about 5 years ago.~ Gaia said.

~Was that when the mark appeared?~ Chasm asked Fado

Fado's body had its left hand index finger point to his right upper arm near the shoulder.

~Power.~ he said and nothing came to mind

it placed its left index and middle fingers on his forehead.

~Wisdom.~ he said and still nothing came to mind like before

it put whole left hand on his heart.

~Courage.~ he said lastly and a chime he heard in his mind, but nothing came to mind

~Let's see five years ago.~ he said thinking he feels the memories coming to him.

Fado focuses on the dreams as his body took a standing meditative stance before working through the poses.

~I did feel something 5 years ago and i was outside after Zelda's first visit.~ Fado said and he smiled when it hit him

~I remember looking at the sky and I did see something for a moment, but I didn't think about it at the time.~ fado said

"Miss Zelda, can you touch my back? I think I have a mark there." Fado asked her

"Yes of course, Warrior Fado." Zelda said as her gloved hands connected with Fado's back.

Before Chasm and Gaia's eyes, a shining mark of Hylia appeared on Fado's back.

"Yep, Fado, you were meant to not serve any of our other Goddesses, but Hylia." Chasm said.

"Mom. We're done." Hylia said, coming over with Navi.

"What did you do them; your clothes are all bloody." Gaia asked.

Chasm looked behind Hylia and Navi, and saw the bodies of the other Goddesses maimed, strangled, and overall worn out.

"Aside from the note of almost murdering your sisters, Hylia, you have your first follower." Chasm said

"Who is it dad?" Hylia asked, excited the like a little girl, which was her physical appearance.

"It's Fado." Gaia said.

"Congrats little sis, maybe I'll get one someday." Navi congratulated, already acting like a true goddess.

"Well Navi, that may not happen for at least a year. A Goddess usually gets her symbol a year after being born and/or being brought in as one." Gaia explained.

"So my little follower is Fado?" Hylia asked.

"Yes." Gaia said.

"Well little sis, if it's your duty to also take care of him, then you gotta do it good, because I do have a heart for him." Navi said.

"Kay' then Big Sis." Hylia said.

Fado's body nodded its head before he opened his eyes and started to pop some of his joints.

"Thank you, Queen Zelda." fado said with a smile
15533112111111111111111111.title: Navi is a goddess

155331121111111111111111111.content:
"Chasm, should we get out of here and see what we should do next?" he asked

"Well Fado. I don't know if Hylia and Navi are up to it as of yet, but I'd like to train them, so they don't end up like them." Chasm said, raising an eye towards the still barely living Din, Farore, and Nayru.

"We're up to Dad." Hylia said.

"But are you Navi?" Chasm asked.

Navi nodded with smile.

"Yes, Dad we are up for it." Navi said as fado was looking at her older sisters

Fado teleported near the near death goddesses and slapped them across the face before making his three original swords appeared near him and the blades are engulfed in their elements. they fade into the bodies giving them alittle energy before the swords faded away.

"I gave alittle energy to you three so you are not so close to death, but you three should not say who dies when you are challenged." fado said before teleporting to hylia's hand, but watching them with a steady eye

"Now girls. Do as Fado said. After all, he was one of the helpers to beat you." Chasm said.

"Yes Dad." They all got enough energy to mutter.

"Good. Now Fado, I, Navi, and Hylia, will be off to Hyrule Field, to train them. Be good for your mother, or you KNOW what happens." Chasm said.

"Yes Daddy!" They shakily yelled.

Chasm teleported the 4 to Hyrule Field, and Hylia was amazed about what she could see from the height of a Goddess. Chasm and Fado were normal sized appearing, and Navi and Hylia still appeared in their Goddess/Giantess forms.

"So 1 trick to being a God or Goddess, is Power Control. Sure, having ultimate power to do things you've never done before would be cool, but you can only do them in moderation, like a diet, but for Gods and Goddesses. Keep this in mind Fado, I may just make you a God one day if you like." Chasm explained.

"But the no. 1 rule. Never to do by the hand of a God or Goddess is..." Chasm began to say, but Navi interrupted.

"Is too never eat humans?" Navi asked.

"Correct Navi, trust me, you don't want to do it. My Mother made me swallow an innocent Hylian one day, I still never can forgive myself for the death of that young girl." Chasm said.

Fado nodded before looking at navi weird and chasm confused.

"Wait, wouldn't it be weird if navi and I love each other and I become her brother in god form?" he asked him

"Actually, if a God/Goddess is made from a human by another God, they actually won't be apart of that family, yet if a Goddess makes a human a God or Goddess than they are made for the family. It's all really confusing, but don't ask me, ask my dead Mother and Father, they were the creator of Gods and Goddesses. Thus the king and queen of them." Chasm explained.

"Ok, so you will be training them; but maybe the first thing is shrinking to normal size?" fado asked him looking at them

"Can't. During their training, the Goddesses are forbidden to change to human size.”

"But Dad, I wanna be normal size for a while." Hylia said.

"I'm sorry. But I cannot allowed that." Chasm said.

Fado teleported to Hylia's left shoulder and rubbed her cheek.

"Both you and Navi will do great." he said with a smile.

"Thanks for the confidence my little follower." Hylia said, beginning to tickle Fado.

Due to her huge finger, she ended up tickling his entire body, so wherever it was, Hylia was sure to hit Fado's "Funny Bone"

Fado smiled before chuckling and he teleported near Chasm.

"Chasm, i was thinking that Navi's training could be around the powers she has from the challenge and maybe fire." Fado said to him thinking about her training

"I guess." Chasm whispered, "But where would we find such a place so filled with fire she could control such abilities?"

"Fire temple, water temple, the area around spirit temple in the desert." he said thinking of the temples

He teleported to Navi's right shoulder and hugged her cheek before he kissed her.

"Navi, what do you think of mind control?" he asked her

He looked at the necklace that she got for the challenge around her neck and he look over at Hylia.

"Hylia, can you get this necklace off Navi?" he asked her

"I can get it off myself Fado." Navi said.

"Hey, the necklace of Chasms. It was made to help you be as strong and powerful as the three Goddesses of the Triforce. But we all know how THAT turned out." Chasm said, destroying the necklace underneath his foot.

Everyone laughed, but they all knew that those three goddesses were already being punished for their crimes against Hyrule.

"Fado. Why don't you go ahead and lead Hylia to the Zora River, and I'll head to say the Spirit Temple with Navi to work on her Psychic Abilities, since that is what she's chosen to work on." Chasm said.

"Ok, chasm." fado said before looking up to hylia and he smiled

"What does she need to do for her training at zora river?" he asked

"What will happen to leon, chasm?" he asked

"Now that I'm re-recognized as a god, Leon will become his own seperated being, just looking exactly like me with a few differences." Chasm explained, as he left with Navi.

Fado still hadn't figured out what Hylia would do at the Zora River when it bonked him on the head.

"Stuff with water." Fado said, sighing that he didn't think of it before.

~Ding Ding Ding!~ He heard Chasm call in his mind.

"Come on, Hylia." Fado said as they walked to the zora river

"Yes my little follower. Though you should be following me." Hylia said, stomping ahead still undescribed on where they were going.

Fado was teleporting as he was running to stay ahead of his goddess and he was running towards the Zora River.

"Hylia, you should be following me to the zora river." he said passing her up

"Well, maybe you should be following me, as I am your chosen Goddess." Hylia said, crossing her arms, and make huffing noises like she was mad, but she was really just playing to see if she could get on Fado's nerves.

Fado smiled as he stopped for a minute before jumping up and landing on her shoulder.

"I know you are trying to fool me into thinking your mad." he said kissing her on the nose and running off into the Zora Lands.

"You couldn't catch me if you tried." he said mocking her with a playful smile before running off leaving her behind

Hylia smiled and began running after Fad, creating cracks and dents in the Earth with her large sandals. Eventually chasing him into a cornered wall by the Zora Cavern and quickly grabbed Fado taking him towards where he said to a river by the Zora Waterfall Entrance

Fado disappeared and he reappeared on her shoulder and pulled out his flute. He began playing a song as water from the river begin to rise and twist into a figure which soon took the form on navi.

"Ok Hylia, what can you do with water?" fado asked as the water returned to the river

"Well, I don't know. Daddy said you had to teach me everything. I may have a symbol, but that doesn't mean I'm exactly trained." Hylia said as innocent as a flower

~You sly old fox.~ fado thought thinking about Chasm
155331121111111111111111111.title: Goddesses in training

1553311211111111111111111111.content:
"Hylia, do you like music?" he asked before returning to his song

"Well, I didn't have anything to do since Daddy was in the Master Sword, and Mama was always protecting humans from her spot in the Realm, I really had nothing else to do than listen to the music created on human harps by angels. It was very pretty." Hylia said.

"Ok, so maybe you can use the harp to help you control the water." Fado said as he made a Gold Harp appeared

He used the Emerald to grow the Harp to fit her hands and be able to play it.

"Each string of the Harp is a note and with enough notes you will have a song for you to control the water." Fado said playing several notes on his flute as a demonstration

"Okay. Here we go." Hylia said, getting ready to play the Harp. She took a huff of breath, and began playing with her eyes closed. Little did she know, she had been playing as beautifully as the Angels she had listened to in the Realm.

The sound of the harp echoed through Hyrule, fighting in Castle Town stopped, and even Chasm and Navi heard it from the depths of the Spirit Temple. After she had began playing, Fado noticed water was rising up and down to the song that Hylia had been reciting on her harp.

Fado smiled as he stood and joined in by playing his flute and guide her into using lower notes and higher notes on their intruments.

~Hylia, your playing is beautiful and lets play together.~ fado said in her mind using his power as they continued playing their music and he had one eye on the water in the river.

The Water continued to manipulate as the two played their instruments, eventually creating an ice sculpture of Fado laying his head against a sleeping Hylia's Dress.

"I think we did good." Hylia said, inspecting the sculpture when they stopped playing.

Fado nodded with a smile before putting his flute away and pulled out an ocarina. He looked at it before chanting something of a spell and the sculpture will never melt or be destroyed.

"That will be a great piece in your bedroom when you take it back home." he said before getting back to training her

"Each instrument has its high notes and low notes that includes my flute and your harp, but i'm going to try something different for this lesson." fado as he play a song with high and low notes

Hylia listened intently to Fado's Preformance, and clapped when he had finished.

"Thank you for the applaud. So, why don't you try." Fado said.

Hylia followed the same notes and patterns as Fado had demonstrated, and another Ice Sculpture, this time one of Din, Nayru, and Farore was made. Fado was tempted to smash it, but held back the ambition to.

"Very good, Hylia." fado said before shrinking the sculptures to fingurine size for Hylia to keep in her room

He put his ocarina next to his flute, but he walked on the river after a few minutes of focusing his energy.

"Aside from using an instrument to help you to control water, you can use poses or maybe a dance for more control and flow of the water." he said as he had water focused into a small orb before pulling his hands apart making the orb bigger

When the orb is big enough, move his hands in an ancient style of fighting as the water moves with his hands becoming thin or small snake like whip. he concentrated for a minute and and the water turned into the fairy form of Navi.

"We should start with something easy for you." he said as he next off the river

"I think I'm better off just using my Harp." Hylia said, turning the other way.

He teleport to see her face and stared into her eyes.

"I can teach you one last lesson with the harp, but then I will have to teach you another way to control water." he said before showing her a smile before rubbing her cheek

"I will teach you everything I know about controlling water and it can be useful if you have to defend yourself in a fight." he added

"Okay. But you're still my follower, so if I tell you to stop when I'm tired, then you just stop." Hylia simply said.

He nodded before he smiled.

"All I will ask is that you give it your all and do your best, will you do that for me, hylia?" he asked

"Yes my little follower." Hylia said, petting Fado's head as if he were a dog.

"Alright," he said before pulling out both his flute and ocarina before having a mirage appear and take his ocarina

"Take your harp and use both lessons together." he said before both he and his mirage started to play a song

Hylia again listened intently, then once he was done, she followed the same note pattern, and the water made swift motions like a snake, this time not making an ice sculpture.

After another hours worth of water manipulation, Hylia was feeling very tired and wanted to go see how Navi and her father were coming along with her training of Psychic Control.

Fado is on her shoulder as she was resting before they teleported to the spirit temple.

"I'm very proud of you and I'll show you a cool trick after we go check on navi and your father." he said hugging her cheek

"Okay." Hylia said, petting his head once more.

After she had recovered from her training, fado put his ocarina away and started to play another on his flute, but this time he jumps off her and lands on the water in the river. he started to dance before skating on the water and the water lifted him up as if he is on the head of a snake, but the water goes ahead of him as he dance on the water while playing a song.

~As a goddess, you should already be able to read my mind or something like that; but this is one of the cool things you can do with water. After our visit, we are going to lake Hylia for some special training.~ Fado said in her mind

~I wonder if you are done with your training though, but we should ask him~ he added before having two watery hands help hylia up and they went walking towards the Spirit Temple
1553311211111111111111111111.title: Hylia's training

15533112111111111111111111111.content:
~Of course I can read minds as you've guessed, every goddess and god can do that from birth or from transformation.~ Hylia said walking with Fado in her hands.

They made it to the Spirit Temple in quite a short time and saw Chasm and Navi training outside the temple killing creatures such as Green and Purple Leevers with only their minds. Navi of course, could destroy a larger range, being at her Goddess Height.

"You're doing fantastic Navi, and look who's here. Fado and Hylia." Chasm said. "Hey Daddy. Hey Navi." Hylia said, hugging the two. "Hey Little Sis." Navi said, patting Hylia on the head.

Fado was still in her hands and was having some trouble breathing.

~Can't breathe.....Need air.~ was heard in their minds

"Why don't you take a rest my follower?" Hylia said.

"How...are you....not out of breath?" Fado panted.

"We Gods and Goddesses have unlimited sources of energy." Chasm said.

Fado lay down as Hylia asked to, and went to sleep.

~Chasm, Hylia is doing very good in her training and she has learned all of my ways to control and use water in a possible fight if she is in one; but we are going to Lake Hylia for some special training.~ fado said to him while he was sleeping

~Alright Young Warrior, continue your rest, and you may wake up at the lake.~ Chasm thought back.

~How is Navi's training coming along?~ he asked

~Very well. She becoming quite the force to be reckoned with. For enemies that is.~ Chasm thought, then chuckling.

~Well, she still have earth manipulation, water inflation; but i have a trick to show her for that one, and we both know that she has growth and shrink powers.~ he said to him

~can you the differents parts of the triforce? I'm alittle confused about that since i summoned your and gaia's triforce.~ he asked

~ Gods and Goddesses can summon the triforce, but only specific ones, such as my mother, father, Din, Nayru, and Farore.~

~What about you, Gaia, Navi, and Hylia?~

~Sadly, no.~

~So each of you have your own triforce?~

~Yes believe it or not, there is more than one Triforce, Each for every family of Gods and Goddesses~ Chasm thought.

~Hmm, very interesting.~ fado said before his body stood up, but his eyes were still closed and he pulled out his flute

Fado started playing a song on his flute and soon a trail of moving water came to him, but he jumped on the water without falling through and he started to dance in his sleep as the water moves around them.

~Hylia, show your dad the ice sculptures you made.~ he said

~Yes, of course.~ Hylia said taking the Ice Sculpture's from her dress pocket and showing them off.

"Impressive, these will go in your room when we get back to the realm" Chasm said.

~When we will get to the lake, the lessons there will be more fun based and i think maybe navi should join us; but you are welcome to come along.~ fado said as his body and the water snake was flying around until he made a wrong turn

He jumped over Hylia's head before he landed on the water as it went straight up with him on top of the head and he was moving down like a rollercoaster, but he was above navi's head and he jumped off the water falling towards her shirt pocket. His aim was off and he fell into her shirt by accident.

~Navi, it was an accident and I was not looking where I was going to jump.~ fado said in her mind and he was trying to get out with a blush

~I was aiming for your open pocket where you put me before.~ he added with a nervous smile

"Really now Fado?" Everyone said, trying to upset him for laughs.

He opened his eyes and looked around before teleported to navi's left shoulder.

"Yeah, keep laughing." fado said with a playful smile knowing they were pulling his leg

"We can use a break from the training." he said

"Besides I bet any of you couldn't get me on the way to the lake any way." fado said smile before vanishing and dash teleporting to the lake before they have the chance to get him

"Alright, everybody, TELEPORT!" Chasm yelled, snapping his fingers, making everyone teleport (not Fado) to Lake Hylia.

Fado clapped his hands for them when he got there waiting on them.

"Nice try, but i knew you were going to do that chasm." fado said as he stood on the water before throwing water bombs at them getting them water before jumping farther back on the lake

"Do you really think you can beat all of us like that," Chasm said.

"Especially at our full sizes." Chasm grew to his God Height after saying that and the group was able to block the water bombs easily.

Fado just smiled before sending millions of fado mirages to fight them as he started playing his flute making the water form water cannons and they opened fired on them sending giant sized water bombs at them.

"I'm smarter than you think." he said as he started to dance skating on the water while playing his flute

"Really Now." Navi said making every copy of Fado be pulled in half and then burned.

Then Hylia grabbed the real Fado and cupped her hands, imprisoning him.

Fado just smiled before letting loose an ear splitting roar in their minds making them covering their ears and he jumped away from them.

"Yep." he said before waiting for chasm to strike as he was on the lake again skating away from them

"Chasm, I know your here." fado said keep moving not staying in one place

~You're right, I am here.~ Chasm said, before taking control of Fado's body and skating back into Hylia's Hands.

Fado was able to smile before barraging chasm’s mind with so many thoughts at one time so he was able to break free and push him out of his body. He jumped back before she was able to catch him and he kept smiling.

~You three almost had me.~ he said in their minds
15533112111111111111111111111.title: A game of catch

155331121111111111111111111111.content:
~But I’ll end this on my terms.~ he added before appearing on navi’s shoulder looking at the tree near the edge of the lake

~That is the real fado; he has been sleeping since hylia and I left to see you and navi. His mind is controlling my body as I speak and either navi or hylia can wake him up, but do it gently because something is making him a little jumpy.~ he said

"Alright. I'll go wake up my little follower." Hylia said, gently wading across the lake, which was more like a deep puddle to her, and crossed to the tree Fado was sleeping on.

She poked his tiny body as gently as possible and even that woke him up. He popped his back, and jumped onto Hylia's hand, traveling back with her, and being set down on the ground, while Chasm reverted to human size to speak with him.

"Your copy said you were jumpy, that reason, may I ask?" Chasm asked.

Fado was about to speak when Chasm had recieved a telepathic message from Gaia.

"Hey kids, I need to run over to Castle Town to get some ingredients for dinner, Navi, can you take Hylia back home? Fado, you're welcome to go as well." Chasm asked.

"Sure Dad." Navi said, getting more used to reffering Chasm as her father.

Navi teleported Hylia and Fado home, and Chasm teleported to Castle Town to get the supplies.

Fado was resting from training Hylia, but something evil was coming for him and he has used one his powers to control the body of one of his copies so his real body would be sleeping and protecting itself from the evil being. he looked around before a chill ran up his spine, but he shook his head and went to look for Din, Nayru, and Farore.

~I'm sorry, but I can’t say what is making me jumpy and I'll be with your sisters, Hylia. There is something I need to do first and you can show me your room either before or after dinner.~ Fado said before leaving them

Fado found the three sisters watching a tv show. They felt his presence before even noticing him, and prepared into a battle stance.

"Calm down." Fado said.

“I’m here to talk; not to fight.” He said before sitting next to them on the couch

"What do you wish to talk about?" All 3 asked intently always open to other people thoughts

He closed his eyes and open his mind for them to see his memories slowly till the ones around the challenge stopped him.

"I need your help with something and I would like to do it somewhere private." he said before opening his eyes and looking at them

"Well we know the best place." Farore said, picking Fado up, and leading them to their room.

"Why your room?" Fado asked.

"Hey, it's the most secret place we could think of, compared to humans, we're only teenage girls. In fact, we'd be not much older than you if we were human." Din said.

"So what help is of your request?" Nayru asked, with big, anime-like eyes.

“Something evil has been coming for me while I was resting from training Hylia. It felt like it was from child’s nightmare during my youth and I would like for you to test me.” He said

"Let me guess, you want us three to try to explore your brain, and try to find whatever is plaguing your mind so you can concentrate properly?" Nayru asked.

Behind Nayru, Din and Farore were betting cash to see if that's what Fado had wanted.

"Concentrating isn't a problem, but I have a feeling that I need to train my body using hand to hand combat like i used to. So I think you three will have to look in my memories for that something and use it as a test for me in a dream realm, but I want you three to test me in my fighting skills as well before my test." he said rubbing the back of his head while looking at them

"So what do you exactly want us to do?" Din asked.

"Yeah, how are we supposed to test you when we're not up to maiming and eating humans anymore?" Nayru asked.

"Nayru, I believe you owe me 100 Goddess Coins." Farore said, with a smirk on her face.

Fado looked the coins before taking them from farore and nayru.

"I came to you three since you tested the Hero of Time and I trust you." fado said

He sighed.

"You have look in my memories, find the nightmares that I think I have felt before and set them in a dream realm; but you three will have to test me in my fighting skills before that. As to testing me, you should be creative instead of killing and maiming humans." he explained

"Maybe for your coins." he suggested

"What, no! I worked hard for these coins!" Farore said.

"Fa, you bet on a kid's mind. How is that working hard? The only thing it is, is Gambling." Din said.

"Yeah sis, just put the coins in." Nayru said.

"Also Fado, remember we still have this." Din said, snapping her fingers, making Fado's Fourth Sword appear.

"I guess this could be an extra prize." Nayru said, taking the sword, and putting it with the coins.

"And, we except your challenge, as long as you play on our terms." Farore said.

"What are your terms?" he asked

"You face us in an arena that suits to our powers. And you can only use one sword." Farore explained. "We can't exactly tell you what our areas will be, but then after you face all three of us, you have to face all 3 of us at once, only using you and one mirage." Din said

Fado smiled as he sit on one of the beds before going into a meditative sleep and opened his mind to them.

~I accept your terms.~ he said

"As honorable as we now are, we will let you choose which order to fight us in." Din said.

~I choose Farore to fight with me first.~ he said
155331121111111111111111111111.title: At home.

1553311211111111111111111111111.content:
"Alright, you've chosen me, a toughie of the three sisters." Farore said.

"Whatever." Fado said, rolling his eyes.

Farore huffed, and snapped her fingers.

Fado then woke in a deep forest, tangled by thorny vines.

"Welcome to my Sanctuary." Farore echoed, before a Giantess Cypress grew from the ground.

"Farore?!" Fado yelled.

"Yes, But here I am known by the animals and other creatures, as Goddess Cyperia." Farore said.

"And I can control every living thing here, except you that is." Farore, or "Cyperia" said.

"I will start by doing this." 'Cyperia' said making the vines, which tangled Fado even tighter scratching his arms and legs.

"I do hope you know I won't hold back, my Forests' Morsel. And just to give you an advantage, I will tell you of the creatures that live in this forest." 'Cyperia' said.

"There are wolves, vultures, and rats. But these rats are different. Here comes one now." Cyperia said, as a giant Rat with wings and vicious wolf teeth.

"A Hybrid Creature." Fado yelled.

"Correct, the wings of a vulture, the teeth of a wolf, and the body of a rat, combine them with a Forest Brand Fuse Potion, and you get this." Cyperia said.

Fado looked around something to help him break free from his binds, but he smiled before triggering one of his powers and his head dropped down. the Rat with wings looked like it was fighting something and it was losing, but soon it calmed down and it started to free fado's body.

~You have a good idea there, farore.~ was heard everywhere at once as the rat continued freeing the body

~Except one thing and that I'm smarter than you think.~ he said coming from behind her and drawn din's sword

"This is not a mirage it's an illusion." he said before he vanished and his body's came back up and breaking the rest of the binds

"You can't control anything if there is nothing to left alive." he added before using some of his energy to make the blade engulfed in flames

Fado started his assault on the trees and wildlife with his fire sword, but he is using his grand firestorm barrage to attack everything. When everything is burnt to ash, he saved his last strike for her and made a clean cut; but he stabbed the sword in the tree stump causing it to burn.

"Yeah, THAT was tough." he said feeling sarcastic before waiting for the real fight

"Fight me yourself." he said baiting her

"Why would I need to." Farore said, still in her Cypress Form.

"I can still control living things, and that means you."

She planted new vines and they grew around Fado trapping him within every tighter, fire-proof vines. Farore brought Fado closer and closer to her mouth, until he was so close to taste her breath.

"Remember the dangers. I may not eat humans anymore, but I still scare them for fun." Farore said.

"Ugh." Fado grunted at Farore's "Nature Breath."

He was able to slip his one sword for this fight and cut through the vines.

"Take this!" Fado yelled jumped for her tongue, looking to chop it off entirely from her Cypress Form.

"Not so fast, I believe this is mine." Farore said, plucking the sword from Fado's hand, then swallowing it.

"Oh, and you can't use another sword for this fight, so I guess this is a loss for you." Farore said.

Fado smiled before chopping off her tounge with his hand like iron cutting wood and he snapped his fingers making his sword burn with fire within her body.

"If you can't take the heat, then don't play with fire." he said as the blade's fire is getting stronger and soon her tree form is burning to ash from the inside out

Farore teleported out of that body and picked Fado up coughing his sword out.

"Good Job little buddy." She said with a sore voice

~It hurts eating swords you know.~ She thought to Fado.

He smiled before making his sword appeared in his hand so she won’t have to cough it up.

~You weren’t that tough.~ he said smiling

~Din, your next.~ he said into her mind

"Alright." Farore sorely said.

"Seeya when you’re done little guy."

He smiled and kissed her on the cheek.

“Thanks.” He said before teleporting into din’s field of battle

Fado then appeared in a land ravaged by Volcano's, and pools of Lava.

"Din?" Fado called.

"Where are you?"

"I'm right here buddy." said the Goddess Giantess, who was resting in one of the pools of boiling lava, completely naked.

"So, what's your special forme?" Fado asked, walking up to the side where Din was resting.

"Oh, this isn't my stage; this is where I was born. It's a comfortable place for me being a Fire Goddess." Din said.

"Well, I beat farore and your next." he said as he switched his sword for Nayru's blade

"Yeah, but you don't fight me straight up." Din said, picking Fado up.

He tilted his head confused and looked at her.

"Huh?" he asked

"You'll be fighting in me." Din said.

He looked at her shocked and surprised before he shook it off.

“Alright, I’m game.” He said smiling

"Alright, down you go little buddy." Din said, dropping Fado in her mouth, swallowing him whole. "Ugh." Din said. "Did my Sister's Cypress Breath hit you or something, also beware of lava falling or flooding at times, also shaking, I swim with my mouth open."

“What do I have to do while inside you?” he asked looking around

"Just explore around and see if you can find my inner being, Menyassan. If you can't find her, just call me, and I'll swallow some lava, that is mine and her's favorite drink, she always drinks it when I swallow it." Din said.

"Ok, din" fado said just before a chill ran up his spine again and something is in his mind

"Grrr." fado said shaking his head and trying to block out the feeling in his head

"Sorry din, but i have to put a pause on the challenge for now." he said before teleporting out of her body and use his power to make a mirage appear and his body fell to the ground around the lava pool

"When you swallowed me, i had a bad feeling and that something felt real familiar when it came into my mind." fado said clearly shaken up by the feeling

"I still agree to your teams, but this is only time that i have to do this." he said looking at his body as it laid there still

Fado stood there like a stone remembering something and it was of a black mass, but it was not made of shadows.

"I remember the feeling was from something made of a black mass, but it was not made of shadows and there was this feeling of evil intent coming from it. When i was younger, i would get these nightmares most likely about the same thing and my mother would be the only one who could calm me down." he said with a small sound of fear in his voice

"I can still do the challenge, but i would have to do in a mirage's body since i used a power to switch bodies." he said sitting down and looking at din.

"How about we stop for now, and just hang out until your original body is done resting, it/he does kinda look feverish." Din suggested.
1553311211111111111111111111111.title: Fado's test Part one

15533112111111111111111111111111.content:
Then Chasm popped in.

"Kids, get out of here now, we have trouble." He said.

"What is it Dad?" Din asked.

"My Mom is attacking Castle Town." Chasm said.

Fado’s real body shot straight up with a scared look on his face and the mirage vanished.

“Mom.” He said before teleporting out and he woke up back in the girl’s room and he teleported back to hyrule castle town on his own.

~Dammit!~ he yelled in his mind pissed off and he pulled out his swords

Fado see the naga has his mom in her hand, but not for long. He used his enchantments on both himself and his sword before slicing her arm off and saving his mother from dying.

“Hey Bitch!” He yelled towards the naga and he set his mother down as he was ready for a fight

"You think you can stand up to me, the Ruler of all Goddesses?!" The Naga hissed at Fado, showing off her snake-like tongue and body. "Mother! I demand you stop!" Chasm said, appearing with everyone else. "Drop Fado's Mother, and drop the thought of devouring anyone else." Chasm said.

"Ah, how is that girl I made you devour when you were seven dear?" The Naga asked Chasm. "I can never forgive myself or you for that. I owe her this at least." Chasm said, launching a sphere made of his own aura at the Naga.

It nailed her in the face, and she hissed angrilly. "As soon as this is done, I'm having your whole family and you go into my stomach acids." She said, regenerating the arm that Fado had cut off completely. "Sorry Mother. But that won't happen." Chasm said.

"Fado." Chasm said, bending down to him. "What Chasm?" Fado asked. "I'm going to throw you in the direction of your mother, and I want you to take her, and run. Go back to your house. I'm sorry, but I'm giving you no option." Chasm said, picking Fado up, and throwing him in the direction of his mom.

He stopped in mid flight and the marks were glowing stronger than before. He made millions of fados and some of them took his mother to their home as the others with him charged at the snake.

"Like Hell I will.!" He yelled as he merged with his mirages and formed a giant fado in a mass of shadows

"This is my fight, Chasm and you do have a option. making me a god." he said before grabbing the naga by the tail and swinging her around before letting her fly out of the castle town and into Hyrule Field (think of Mario swinging bowser around then lets him go on a bomb)

He teleported after her and the aura around him was blood red.

"I don't care if your the ruler of Lawn Gnomes, but no one lays a hand on my mother kills her without going through me first." he said with a dark voice

A red energy surrounded him in the form of a wolf and he was growling.

"I'll send you back to the Hell hole you crawled out." he said talking like a beast

Hundreds of red swords appeared behind him and he charged at the naga with the swords following him.

"Sorry kiddie. Being the ruler of all Gods, I also ascertain every power of Gods and Goddesses. But how about we fight on a more suitable battlefield, I don't want to ruin the land of which I eat the people as normal meals. And don't you dare say I'm not a Goddess, because I am." The Naga said. Chasm then jumped in. "Hello Mother." He said, blocking the punches she threw at Lightning Speed to get him out of the way.

"Ever since you made me eat that young girl, I've got more powerful. In fact, I never told anyone this, but she's still alive." Chasm said. "What, but I saw with my own eyes she digesting in your stomach!" The Naga said.

"She did, I coughed up her bones, and using them, I created her anew. She now lives within the body of one of my daughters. Menyassan. Remove yourself from Din's Body!!" Chasm yelled, as a Succubus appeared on his should. The Giant Fado looked at her tiny body on Chasm's shoulder.

"That tiny thing is going to help you defeat me?!" the Naga yelled. "Tiny? Oh no no no. With the bones of Maria, who is now Menyassan, I created the perfect being, a succubus." Chasm said. "Yeah. So, Master Chasm, can I grow now?" Menyassan asked. "Yes, please do so. I'm sure my mother would be pleased to see how powerful I made you." Chasm said.

Menyassan flew to the other side of Hyrule Field, and sucked all of Fado's Dark Energy off of his Giant Forme, making him shrink back to normal.

As the dark aura flowed off her, she began growing, and didn't stop, until even the Naga was no bigger than her big toe. Even Chasm saw as her tiny wings grew bigger and bigger, until they were the length of ten airplanes and her teeth (Now pointed like a vampire's) were miles long. All she had on clothes wise was a bandana which tore off in the growth process, and a black pair of boots, which stayed on her. Otherwise, she was completely naked, no clothes would ever fit her in this size, so she didn't bother wearing any at all.

Fado was laughing in the snake’s mind and she could hear him.

~One for Chasm and an ass kicking for you, bitch.~ he said before landing a giant red wolf shadow punch to her face

He teleported to Din's shoulder to stay off the ground.

"Woah, Menyassan!?" Din yelled, floating up to the Gargantuan face of Menyassan. "Yes Mistress Din, Chasm has summoned me to help take down this bitch he calls his mom." Menyassan said. "That thing is Grandma?!" Din yelled, completely in shock.

Menyassan picked up the Naga, and it was no more than a cut up string of a spaghetti noodle to her. "I could eat you, it would be so easy." Menyassan said, wrapping her saliva-coated, pink tongue around the Naga's small body, making her coated in her saliva.

"Now I know how my victims feel, at least I'll be able to take one into death with me." the Naga said, wriggling out one of her arms, revealing a person between her fingers. "Oh no." Fado said as he realized that was his mother.

Menyassan didn't notice as the Naga ate Fado's Mother whole, and snake tail first, slipped her into her mouth. Fado tried to yell to Menyassan to cough the Naga up, but he was too small compared to her, and didn't have the dark energy to grow to the needed size, but by the time he got Din to, it was already too late, both Fado's Mother and the Naga were swallowed whole by Menyassan, and were digesting in her organs.

After the battle, Fado told Menyassan what she accidentally did, and then Menyassan noticed a humanly presence in her stomach, and told every to stand back so she could regurgitate it, but what everyone didn't know, Succubi don't regurgitate through their mouths, they regurgitate through their vaginas.

Fado's Mother popped out in a pile of Menyassan's Stomach Acid, even though it came out of her vagina, and ran over to Fado, still scared for dear life.

Fado took her home and cleaned her up.

~Chasm, I’m going to be busy with my mother and maybe you can clean up the mess.~ he said to him before closing his mind

Chasm heard, and smiled yes at him, and told Menyassan to shrink to her normal size, and return to the insides of Din.

Before swallowing, Din asked "Can you stop munching on my insides please Menya?"

"Sure, but then regularly you have to eat something appetizing like Lava Rats. Not that disgusting Burger stuff you make me feed on." Menyassan said.

Din smiled, and said "Sure." before tossing Menya in her mouth, and swallowing her like a Giantess, even though she was normal sized.
15533112111111111111111111111111.title: Trouble in Castle Town

155331121111111111111111111111111.content:
As they were cleaning up the mess, fado was helping his mother clean herself up and he was telling what happened since he left home.

“I’m sorry that you had to live through that, mom.” He said sadly

"Well son, let's just say...it was an interesting experience. But thanks to that Succubi Goddess, I'm safe, I only feel, penetrated." Fado's Mom said.

"When you feel better, we can talk then and I have some questions about something." he said feeling uneasy.

"Just ask them now." His mom answered.

He sighed as he sit on the couch and slowed down his breathing.

“Did I have a father?” he asked her

"You did." His mother said.

“What was he like?”

"A very kind man, he was strong and smart, almost as powerful as that God fellow who chucked you across the sky for you to save me."

“What did he look like?” he asked her as he was feeling excited

~Chasm, I need you to come here in your human form. You should already know what I’m going to ask you.~ he thought to his friend

“Did he serve to anyone?”

As soon Fado thought it, Chasm arrived at the door, human size. Fado's Mom greeted him in and he sat down next to Fado.

"Your father served, well, I don't know which God or Goddess he served, but he said it being the God of Power and Flipping Dimensions." Fado's Mother said.

"That was up until..he died a few hours ago." Fado's Mother said.

Fado turned to see chasm.

“Did you know him or his god/goddess?” he asked

"Well, I did know of one, but he died long before your father was even born." Chasm said.

"I don't know of another like him."

~She was trying to save my mystery dad and i was only focusing on her. Grrr. Dammit! I want to rip that snake bitch to shreds.~ fado was thinking in his mind and he knows chasm can hear his thoughts

"Chasm, maybe gaia knows someone." he said

"Chasm is the god that chucked me to save you." fado said to his mother

"He is in his human form." he added

Fado stood up and walked outside to wait for them, but he teleported into his secret place where he meditated.

~Chasm, please take my mother with you to the realm. I need to be alone for a moment and you can have din or one of her sisters stay behind to wait for me.~ He said to him with pain in his voice and chasm nodded before turning to his mother

"Let me guess, he needs to be alone." his mother said and chasm nodded

"I figured, call it a mother's instinct." she said as they left for the realm

"So your that god that chucked my son to save me. You have a good arm." Fado's Mother said.

"Oh, here we are." Chasm said, as a pair of white stairs leading above appeared before them.

"So this is the entrance to the realm?" She asked.

"Yes." Chasm said, but then stopped.

"Din, Nayru, Farore, can you show yourselves?" He yelled, before continuing up the stairs.

"Din could you wait for Fado, Nayru, could you carry Fado's Mother to the realm. And Farore, help us with Safe Travel." Chasm directed.

"Yes Dad." All 3 said.

"So, these are your daughters, wait, Din, Nayru, Farore. You three are the Goddesses of the Golden Power!" Fado's Mother yelled.

“Yes, they are and so were my mother and father.” Chasm said as din left for fado

As they left for the realm, din walked to where fado is hiding and she can hear his thoughts, which are in turmoil.

~I wasn’t fast enough to save him.~ was heard in his mind

~I almost lost her.~

~That dark power was better at beating that wretch.~

~I wasn’t strong enough to save them.~

These were some of the thoughts that were going through his head and he was crying while he let his bottle of emotions burst open.

~I couldn’t control my emotions and I let my dark side control my body. My fear was stopping me from doing the challenge with Din and her inner being.~ he was thinking as he felt someone coming towards him by the footsteps

“Dammit, why am I acting like this?” he asked himself

"Maybe because you feel bad. Or Down." Din said, finally approaching him.

"What are you doing here, Din?!" He yelled angrily.

“Because dad told me to wait for you.” She said

He sighed before looking away and sitting down on the ground. Din looked around the place where he was hiding and it was almost completely destroyed except for the small pond and a bouquet of flowers.

“It was that dark power I was feeling and your grandmother trying to kill my mother didn’t help.” He said

“I always had some idea of what dark side I had, but feeling that rage and power surprised me. I never knew my father or even met him once.” He said resting his head on his knees
155331121111111111111111111111111.title: Fado and his mother

1553311211111111111111111111111111.content:
“Heh well, my body may not be here and you won’t see or meet me; but I’ll see you.” Was heard around them as a spirit appeared

“Don’t speak, son. You need to hear this.” The spirit said as it turned to be his father

“It was my own fault that you didn’t have any real contact with me, but you were in full control of that dark power to have let it ‘take over’ your body. You were protecting your mother and it wanted to help you achieve that goal. During that challenge again your friend here and her sisters, I helped you there as well and lend you some of my power.” He said before hugging his son

“Now I’ll be around the Spirit temple when you want to see me and I’ll expect to fight the normal fado; not this little child of my former son.” He said baiting fado

Fado smiled a small smile before trying to uppercut his father’s face, but he clipped his chin.

“That’s better and I’ll see you soon.” His father said before fading away and leaving them alone

~One thing I know is that you will need my power.~ was heard in his mind and it sounded like him with a beastly growl

~We will talk later.~ fado said as feeling like his old self

He teleported onto din’s shoulder.

“Come on din let’s get home so we can eat dinner.” He said with a smile

"Alright. Then maybe we should continue our training. You still have to fight Menya inside me." Din said, laughing.

“I’m looking forward to it.” Fado said

They walked to the stairs before walking up into the realm.

Upon entering the realm, Din and Fado saw Chasm speaking to Gaia, and Chasm was holding a God-sized Backpack for some reason.

"Where are you going Dad?" Din asked, running up to him.

“Well, I'm heading back to my birthplace, being 1/8th Naga, my birthplace is a forest deep in between dimensions called Felarya Forest." Chasm said.

"And that is the only way to get to the Forest from the realm." Chasm said then pointed to a deep black door that stood out in the abyss of white streets that was the realm.

"I received notice from one of my friends there, a party is being thrown for me upon me and Gaia becoming the King and Queen of all Gods and Goddesses." Chasm explained.

"So wait, Dad, Grandma and Grandpa were the king and queen?" Din asked.

"Yes. But Felarya Forest is very dangerous, especially for humans, such as Fado and his Mother." Chasm said.

"Why?" Fado asked.

"All Nagas and Nekos in Felarya, devour humans and see them as regular diet food." Chasm said.

"What?!" Fado yelled.

"There is also no use setting them straight, so I sadly have to let it be, and I just eat the delicious fruit in the forest." Chasm said.

"Why are you letting humans die Chasm?!" Fado yelled in anger

"Relax, there are a few Nagas who only eat humans half the time, also unlike Gods, Goddesses, and the Human Race, Pure Nagas and Nekos don't have any stomach acid, plus whatever is in a Neko or Naga stomach, is immortal." Chasm explained.

"How long are you going to be gone?" fado asked him

"One of my old friends wants me to stay with them. She tries not to eat humans, but sometimes cannot hold back the urge. Her name is Crisis, she's the same species of Naga as my mother was." Chasm answered.

"I estimate about a week or so. If you want to come at least to her place, feel free to Fado."

Fado thought about it, but he shake his head.

“Maybe next time, chasm. I have some other things to do.” He said

"Well there won't be a next time. If you don't come now, you won't get another chance, because I'll be closing up the portal here, and opening it somewhere only I can access. Only to protect unlucky humans who wander in and end up getting devoured." Chasm said.

He nodded before teleporting near chasm and his swords appeared on his back.

“I guess this can be a training trip for me and maybe I can help your friend break the urge.” He said

"That won't happen. Like I said, it can only take a lot of bonding with the Naga/Neko/or Mermaid." Chasm said.

"What? There are mermaids too?" Fado asked.

"Yes, except more evil than regular ones. They'll near you towards their bridge with their Siren Song, then they'll hide in the water, and you'll only see their blue face for a moment before swallowing. Also to note: There is no way to get out of Mermaid's Stomach, they're skin is like the unbreakable metal Leon trapped you in, they don't go to the bathroom, and to make it even worse to taunt you there; every mermaid stays completely naked." Chasm explained.

"Well, unless you’re the victim of one Mermaid Giantess named Envy. She always bathes in the lake, and is totally concealed, even above water, so when you walk by, she'll pick you up, and unlike any other Mermaid, she'll slurp you down feet first so you can get one last look at the world." Chasm added.

“But it takes a single step or push in the right direction.” Fado said

“I’ll stay with you till you get to your friend’s home.” He added

"But you'd best stay in my pocket. Any Naga, even my friend when she's really hungry will starts salivating uncontrollably at the sight of a human." Chasm said.

“Can they cancel my powers?” fado asked him as he hopped chasm’s open shirt pocket

"Yes, Felarya Forest blocks all magic usage. Your sword enchantments are utterly useless there." Chasm said.

"But most don't know of this block because no creatures in Felarya are magic users."

“You know about this block how?”

"Because I'm a magic user." Chasm said.

"You're not the only one who enchants swords and such."

~Maybe I have a way to get by it.~ was heard in their heads and fado froze

~What are you doing in my head?~ fado asked

~Living. Remember, you and I are like leon and chasm.~ he said and fado growled

~I don’t kill.~ he added

~You do if someone like your mother or navi is in danger.~ he said and fado can feel him smirking

Fado sighed before passing himself out and he took his dark side into a realm of his own.

~I’m going to be busy with him so my body will be sleeping while you are traveling, chasm.~ fado said
1553311211111111111111111111111111.title: Soon they left for home

15533112111111111111111111111111111.content:
"It'll be a quick travel, so you won't need to for long. We just need to go through the door, cross through the dimensions, and we'll be there." Chasm said, beginning to walk towards the black door.

He pushed it open, and went through to pass through dimensions.

~Alright, but I’m going to be dealing my dark side.~ he said

"Okay." Chasm answered, while they phased through the dimensions to Felarya Forest, land of mythical creatures.

Fado is in a realm in his mind where he is surrounded by a green field and a forest while staring down his dark side.

“Let’s gets this over with.” He said

As he and his dark side clashed in battle, Chasm walked around exploring the now expanded Felarya Forest. It was much bigger than when he was young.

"Chasm!" A Feminine voice called out to him, before he received a hug from behind, only revealing to be his best friend Crisis, who had adapted much more since they were kids.

"Crisis! How are you?" Chasm asked.

"Pretty good." Crisis said, as Chasm noticed she was carrying a woven basket full of fruits and vegetables.

"Who's that for?" Chasm asked.

"Well, I was going to cook a stew for us to enjoy before you got here, but I guess that'll have to wait, because you're here now!" Crisis said excitedly brushing up against Chasm's chest making Chasm accidentally look at her now uncovered and much developed breasts.

"There is only one problem." Crisis said.

Chasm felt fado's inner mind battle getting more serious as it rages on in his mind. Fado is using his hand to hand fighting skills as his dark side is using his swords. The sky is getting dark in his mind, but fado is smiling as lightning generated from his body.

~Come on, if you really are me then you should give it all you got. Dark loser.~ was heard from fado's mind to his dark side, but chasm shook his head and looked at his old friend

"So, anyway, what is the problem?" Chasm asked his big breasted friend.

"Well, remember that Frost Succubus Arale?" Crisis said.

"Yeah?" Chasm said.

"She became the queen of Felarya. All she's done is evil things, that's her Frost Castle to the north. She's making it a rule to eat any human scum who enter. So veggie eaters, like you, me, and Vivian, have to either begin eating humans, or duck out in a safe house." Crisis explained.

The fight in fado’s mind stopped since they both heard this and agreed to a truce for now.

“What about fighting this queen, chasm.” Fado said as he popped his head of the pocket

“Yeah, sounds like she needs to be taught a lesson.” His dark side said as he appeared next to him

“We have a truce while we are here.” They said to chasm and sink back into the pocket

"Humans. When did you befriend some of those Chasm?" Crisis asked.

"When I became the King of the Gods and Goddesses all since my mother was well digested by a succubus named Menya." Chasm said.

"Ironic, since your mom was such a vital human eater." Crisis said.
