"And to you human, it's fatal to cause an uprising against Arale, because she freezes anything she touches, even the hottest of swords will freeze in her presence."

Fado and his dark side teleported to chasm’s shoulder with a smile.

“It’s a good think that I know something about blocking out a block.” Dark fado said to chasm and fado nodded

“My will burns hotter than any flame and I will fight anyone who is like his mother.” Fado said referring to chasm

“Besides he is not human.” He said to crisis while pointing to his dark side

Fado pulled out his flute and was getting ready to play before he stopped and looked chasm.

“May we get inside before I start playing and attract some unwanted attention?” he asked

"Too bad my little tasties." Envy said, walking up to the group, licking her lips.

"Chasm, it's good to see you again, I hope you've been eating humans as vitally as your mother?" Envy asked.

"No, I'm no human eater." Chasm said.

"Then since you have no use for them, I'll just swipe your little friends." She said, swiping Fado and Dark Fado, swallowing them, feet-first down her throat.

She licked her lips. "Thanks for the snacks. Now they'll never get out, that is, until they're digested and I have to take a piss!" Envy taunted.

Fado reappeared on chasm's shoulders with his dark side who is smiling at this mer-bitch.

"Nice try, but you can't kill us." dark fado said

"Why are you called envy?" fado asked

"Maybe because she never gets what she wants." his dark side taunted her with a smirk

"No, I'm called Envy because I should've been the queen. Truth is, I'm not even really a human eater, I was gonna become queen so I could either banish humans from coming into Felarya, or prohibit Felaryians from eating them. I was just following the queens' rule." Envy said.

"But she had to beat me by one measly vote."

“I like the second idea better.” Fado said

“Only because there might be some humans that care for those human eaters.” His dark side said appearing on envy’s left shoulder

Fado’s shot wide before smiling and his dark side smiled as well.

“This rule is going to get broken.” Fado said appearing on crisis’s right shoulder

“Miss crisis, can you take us to your home? I have an idea that might work and it involves him.” Fado said while pointing to his dark side

"Of course you cute human!" Crisis said, taking Fado in her free hand, and tickling him non-stop.

He is trying not to laugh from her tickling, but he is starting to lose the mental war on his control and started to chuckle before teleporting to the top of her head.

“My name is fado, not human.” He said before readying to his flute and throw his ocarina to his dark side

“Chasm, I think now would be the time to change the world.” Both fado and his dark side said to their friend

~I have to get stronger before going to fight my father in the spirit temple.~ fado thought

~that is one thing I have to do alone.~ he said in his mind

"Yes, though it may be extremely tough, we need to take down Arale." Chasm said.

"Let's go home first and enjoy these veggies and fruits in a stew first." Crisis said.

Both fados nodded before they were testing their musical playing, but they were playing a song just to play it.

“It’s nice to play something without it controlling something.” Fado said

“Chasm, how did you met your wife?” fado asked him wondering that question for awhile now that he thought about it

"Well, I actually don't know. I remember being knocked out when I was a teen, then I woke up in a bed with Gaia hunched over me with a concerned face, and I was in my Naga forme, being half snake." Chasm explained, grabbing a ripe apple from Crisis' basket.

“Can you still make me a soulless army?” fado asked

He slid down to crisis’s right shoulder and started to concentrate on his marks. They started to move around on his body and hylia’s mark is on his chest while chasm’s mark appeared from his other daughter’s marks on his forehead, but the other three moved to his right hand, arm and shoulder.

"I'd still be able to create a soulless army, except I'd be their maestro." Chasm said.

“He and I will be the distractions while chasm makes an army, but there has to be some others that want to fight back.” Fado said while pointing to his dark side

"Probably." Dark Fado said.
15533112111111111111111111111111111.title: Into the forest

155331121111111111111111111111111111.content:
Soon they made it inside crisis’s home so they can eat her stew after it has been made.

Due to Felaryan Fruit cooking very easily, the stew was made and put in bowls in a matter of 4 minutes.

“Hmm, very tasty and delicious.” Fado said eating his bowl of the stew after growing to chasm’s size.

"Yes I must say Crisis, your stew is scrumptious." Chasm said.

Soon fado finished his stew before grabbing his dark side and setting him on the table.

“Alright tiny, I know that we both know that you know a way around the block so talk.” Fado said

“It’s one of my abilities that can’t be blocked or stopped by anything.” He said and he nodded

“I knew that answer.” Fado said before shrinking down to match his dark side and they pulled out their swords

“First one bleeds loses.” Fado said charges at his dark side

"Sure, but this will be a battle you lose." Dark Fado said, letting Fado charge at him. Fado charged at his dark side, and cut off his arm, or at least he thought he did.

"Huh?!" Fado yelled when he realized his sword made no more than a small dent in his dark sides arm.

Smiling he kept charging at him even while drawing out another blade.

More strikes, only simple scratches were made. Fado soon decided to strike where a mark was before, but still, no progress, he wasn't breaking skin.

With a simple word, his sword started to glow white and he sliced off his arm.

"Nice try." Dark Fado said, regrowing his arm before blood could drop.

His swords still glowing white with light energy, he sliced the dark fado into tiny pieces.

Behind him, Dark Fado reformed and stabbed the sword the Fado's chest. Fado than began to bleed, which meant he lost.

Fado vanished meaning he wasn’t real and the real fado stabbed his dark side in the eye.

Before Dark Fado's blood could boil out of his stabbed eye, He did the same to Fado, and as if at the same time, they both bled.

Fado's head melted before forming back away from the sword.

"Either you lose or we are going to keep doing this till you do." fado said giving him an uppercut to his face

"Fine. Tie. Since we did both bleed there, we both lose. Is that agreeable." Dark said.

“For now.” Fado said sitting down on the table

“Does the queen receive gifts?” he asked

"Yes of course, but those gifts are delivered in sub-zero packages, low enough to make any human suffer until death, until Queen Arale shoves a stick up your ass, and eat you like a Popsicle.

“Good thing that is I’m not human.” Dark fado said smilng

“I can use my instruments to make the water perfect for me as the outside is subzero like a crystal shell.” Fado said

“Maybe the best way for a rebellion is to spread rumors about the queen.” He said thinking out-loud

"No, the last Naga who did that, was sent to Arale's Icy Dungeon, where she feasts on the blood of any human or Naga." Crisis explained, finishing her bowl of stew.

Fado’s energy and power are building with his dark sides power becoming in sync with each other becoming one in mind, body, and spirit.

"Yes Fado? Don't worry, you can speak aloud right now. Everyone else is out." Hylia said, bending down before where Fado was and planting a kiss on his head.

“Why did you believe that I would betray you?”

“What reason would I have to do it?”

“Did you understand why I did for what I did?” he asked

"I was just angry Fado." Hylia said.

“Enough to kill me.” He said

“I think there is one last lesson for me to teach you and then I will have to test you, ok?”

"No, I've decided to change my training, something more useful then water morphing." Hylia said.

“Let me show you the last lesson before we change your training.” he said not looking at her

“I think you look better in a white dress.” He said

"I think I have one in here, but it's more like a dress I wear to events, not one to wear regularly. It looks like a nurses' outfit." Hylia said, searching her walk-in closet for the dress.

“What about a blue dress?” he asked

"Does this work?" Hylia asked, then bringing out a bright blue swimsuit that had the word "cute" written in Japanese on it.

“It will for training and your test.” He said

"Maybe we can actually go check out that new city installment to Castle Town, which is now, with the add-on, becoming the Crystal Kingdom?" Hylia asked, begging to go.

He smiled before appearing on her bed.

“Put something over that and get my mother then we can go.” He said

"But it's a hot day out, I was hoping it could just be you and me exploring the new city. Please?" Hylia asked, this time with cupped hands and a face that could match a Puppy's cuteness entirely.

He started to chuckle at this, but the smile stayed.

“Alright.” He said

"Is it just us, or does your mother want to see too? Because I've been appointed by Daddy to build your new mansion, just your size." Hylia asked.

“It might better if we take my mother with us so I won’t have to make a second trip.” He said

“It might do her some good than staying up here.” He added

"You sure said it." Hylia said, using some of her growing psychic ability to locate and transport Fado's mother to them.

"Hey Fado's Mom, are you ready to take a field trip?" Hylia asked, as if she were a teacher and Fado and his mother were mere students.

She smiled with a nod.

“Yes, I’m ready.” She said before hugging her son

"Then let's go!" Hylia said, setting them on the top of her head, so they'd have a fantastic view of the new Crystal Kingdom.

Hylia ran out into Hyrule Fields, her bare feet making indents in the sandy path.

"Are you two ready to watch me build your mansion?" Hylia asked.

"What does she mean, mansion?" Fado's mother asked.

"It's just out of kindness." Hylia lied, when it really was a part of punishment from Chasm.

“Mom, I’ll tell you about it later.” Fado said

“Yes, hylia we’re ready.” He said

Hylia ran into the Crystal Kingdom, and saw a tall, perfect building to build their new mansion on. While using her psychic abilities to grab the tools she required, she accidentally crushed a car under her bare foot, and which she gasped, and checked under her foot, luckilly for everyone, there was no-one in the car at that time. Hylia first made the building their mansion would stand on, much more durable, than began to use everything she grabbed to carefully build their mansion. Fado and his mother talked and caught up for almost 3 hours before Hylia was done.

"Ta-da!" Hylia presented, the new 7 story mansion Fado and his mom would live in, also crushing another car in the process.

"Woops." Hylia sighed, checking her foot again, relieved for no humane blood being there.

"Anyway, your new house. Congrats." Hylia said.

“Thanks, Hylia.” Fado said before he teleported both his mom and himself to the mansion

“Mom, I think that maybe this could be better for us and it would give us more room.” He said with a smile

~Chasm wanted to you build it as part of your punishment, right?~ he said hylia

~Yep, you got it.~ Hylia huffed, putting her foot down crushing another empty car.

~We should have you work in a demolition office.~ Fado joked.

Fado made mirages appear at their old house to get their things to move into this house.

~Chasm, can hylia come inside human sized?~ he asked

"That's my choice, not dads. May I show you two around?" Hylia asked.

“Sure.” Fado said as his copies were moving their things in to the house

Hylia shrunk down to size, and warped into a sexy tour guide outfit. She showed Fado and his mother every floor.

"Lobby is, well, it's the Lobby."

"Floor 1 is the bedrooms, with 2 occupied rooms, and 7 extra."

"Floor 2 is training rooms, specialized for Fado with every type of weapon: Swords, Bow and Arrows, all that good stuff."

"Floor 3 is the sun room, with glass panes and hot tubs, what could be better?"

"Floor 4 is restaurants, interchangeable may I add, with this lever, here are 100% discount cards by the way."

"Floor 5, I decided to add a game floor, in case Fado has any girls over who may be tomboyish."

"Floor 6, being the last, in building floor, is probably the most relaxing, as it has closets with Swimsuits of all kinds, and pools of extreme relaxation."

"Floor 7, landing area. Here, a private Jet or Heli can come take you to wherever you need all at the notify of a tablet right over there, or you can use your custom built X-Flyers, made from the rubble of cars I stepped on."

“Thanks for the tour.” His mother said

“Maybe you can help the copies move our stuff.” Fado said

"Please, I'm a Goddess not a mover jockey." Hylia joked.

"Should I call Navi down here, maybe you and here can get some hang time, if you know what I mean."

She winked at Fado as she returned to her normal size and back in the swimsuit.

“Mom, do you want to stay here to see the mirages move our things into the house?” he asked

"I'd rather check out the sun room that looked amazing." Fado's Mom said.

“Ok.” He said

Soon the copies finished moving the stuff into the house and they moved it into the bedrooms. Fado left one of them in charge of protecting his mother and he teleported to hylia’s left shoulder.

1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Hylia, lets head back to the lake.” He said

"We should let you rest Fado, and don't try to fight it, I'm your Goddess, so I say so." Hylia said, opening the window to his room, and slipping him in.

“How about we play a few games on the and see if I need rest.” He said

"What games are you interested in playing?" Hylia asked.

“What games are there?” he asked

"Well, there is my size Monopoly, my size Chess/Checkers; or all size Hyrule Field Catch and Stomp." Hylia suggested.

“Checkers.” He said

"Alright." Hylia jumped, making her child like breasts jiggle.

She snapped her fingers, and they appeared in a white space with a giant checker board, with Hylia being normal sized to it, but for Fado, the board and pieces were huge.

"Alright, I'll let you move first, since it'll be tough for you to move." Hylia said.

"As an add on, this space also nullifies all abilities and magic, so except for my size, it's just like we're two normal humans, just playing a friendly game of checkers."

Fado moved his first checker. He pushed the checker in the frontwards direction, and Hylia easily moved a piece near with just a touch of her finger. He jumped that checker. He couldn't exactly see right, because the checker Hylia moved, happened to be right in front of Fado's checker, and not diagonal. He moved the one behind him. Hylia moved one, and jumped the one that was in front of him.

The Score was now at:
Hylia: 1
Fado: 0

Fado made his move and was able to jump one of hers. She was then able to jump one of his.

“Hylia, how is this a fair game?” he asked

"Hey, you chose it, you also can change it. But it'll still be my sized. Unless of course you choose catch and stomp." Hylia answered.

“What is catch and stomp?” he asked

"It's basically tag, except the human is invincible, and a Giant or Giantess such as myself would chase you. If I were to trap you in a negate barrier say like this." Hylia said, trapping Fado in a negate barrier, and then recalling it.

"It stands up to anything and negates anything and everything, except the invincibility. If I were to catch you, I could stomp and jump on you as many times as I like when I'm done the invincibility wears off and the game ends." Hylia said.

Fado was thinking as he was making his move and he jumped onto the checker and looked at the board. He smiled knowing what to do. He picked up the checker and did a triple jump. Hylia then made an amazing quadruple jump, claiming herself quite a few of Fado's pieces, then putting the score at around Hylia (6) Fado (3). He made his move by jumping over five of her pieces. Hylia then jumped the remaining 6 of his pieces in one go, and won the game.

"Sorry, I'm an ace." Hylia said, as soon as she won.

1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Ok, can we play a game where you’re the same size as me?” he asked

"But that would mean the games would be too big for both of us." Hylia said.

“If I take a nap, will you be in my room when I wake up?” he asked feeling tired

"I may not be, but just so you know, you can always call me near using the symbol of a Hylia Follower." Hylia said.

“Well, you’re welcome to pop in my room when you want.” He said

“Do you have a favorite animal?” he asked

~Can you come in here human sized? I don’t you can wear it in your normal size.~ he asked

"Alright." Hylia said, shrinking into human size, this time still wearing the bathing suit, and jumped in through Fado's window.

When hylia came into the room, fado was holding a white baby wolf costume for her and it was her size.

“Also this is for you.” He said as he pulled out a small white wolf plushy for her

"Ah thanks Fado, I'll use my psychic abilities to stretch and grow these out to my Goddess size." Hylia said, giving Fado a hug.

He smiled as he returned the hug.

“Alright I’m going to take a nap and I’ll see you later.” He said

"Seeya Fado." Hylia said, blowing him a kiss and a sexy wink then leaving with the presents.

Fado stripped down to his boxers and put on his sleep clothes before got into his bed to sleep off his tiredness. Hylia went back to the realm realized it was actually night-time there and everyone was asleep so she headed to bed as well. He was sleeping soundly in his bed as thoughts were flying around in his head soon he fell into a deep sleep. Hylia soon did the same.

~I wonder if I could teach navi how to use water to inflate body parts.~ he said in his sleep

~Please Fado, you can have such a mind of a p.e.r.v.~ Navi said, communicating through sleep.

~I’m not a pervert, navi, but I wanted to show you something cool.~ he said

~Sure, you just wanted me to inflate my boobs, I know how all teenage men are, Fado. Don't try me.~ Navi said, chuckling in her sleep.

~No, there is more to it than that and it’s one thing I won’t teach your sister.~ he said as he appeared at the lake in his sleep

~But you have to be to normal size so I can see the difference.~

~Yawwwn. Let's do this in the morning, I'm really heading to sleep now.~ Navi said.

~Ok, but I want to spend some time with you, my beautiful fairy goddess.~ he said before making some water form ice sculptures of navi in all forms

Navi saw this as she was sleeping, and blushed wildly.

~Here, for my soon to be Fairy God.~ She said, using the sand near the lake to make a 50ft tall sculpture of her and Fado arm-in-arm.

~Navi, I’m going to talk a test so I can see which god I’m best suited, but I’m going to delay my fairy god plan alittle so I can get training as a god of the realm first.~ he said before making an ice sculpture of them kissing and another one of them only him carrying her like a bride

~Aww, we'd make a great husband and wife duo. Maybe we should marry one day. Possibly if you luckily do become fairy god.~ Navi said.

~I will, but it going has to wait and I would like to see you in your human/fairy hybrid form. Chasm said that it will more training or so.~ he said

He teleported near her and stole a kiss from her before he smiled.

~I only have eyes for you.~ he said with a toothy grin

~It doesn't matter what form I'm in for you to see me and I have those same eyes for you.~ Navi said, giving him a more passionate kiss on the lips then leaving.

He left the dream and went back into a deep sleep, but he was smiling on the inside and singing a song in his sleep. Navi appeared in his dreams at her full size, but she seemed much darker mannered.

"Are you possibly Dark Navi?" Fado asked.

"Who says I am. What if I'm regular Navi?" She said, a wave of black rushing over her clothes and skin, leaving her eyes a glittery red.

"Cut it out my beloved wife." Dark Fado said appearing at his full size for a Dark God.

"Stop messing with my light-sides' dreams."

"Dark Fado?" Fado asked.

"Yes, as Dark Gods, our special ability is Dream Invader meaning we can either appear to you inside or communicate with you using the power of Dreams." Dark Fado explained.

“Ok, but why are you in my dreams?” he asked

"Just to tell you that." Dark Fado said, as he and Dark Navi vanished from Fado's Dream.

~Wow, he was right about dark navi being hot; but my navi is smoking hot.~ he said before going back to his singing

~Thanks for the complements.~ Fado heard both Navis say simultaneously

~I thought you went to sleep.~ he said to his navi

He went deep into his mind before playing the song he made for the sages. His head was silent as he played the song. Soon he finished the song and he started to make sculptures of the sages. Once made, he sent the seven sculptures to their respective locations and sages. He made another set, but he sent them to his room with the navi sculptures and a smaller version of the sand sculpture with the bride sculpture. He smiled gently at his work and quietly drifted off to sleep. He dreams of spending days with navi and hylia, but shows link a way to fuse the fierce deity sword and the master sword. Talks with his mother as sparring with his dad in the spirit temple, but the last thing he sees is the wedding of him and navi with him having become a fairy god and a god of the realm.

~Maybe I can get a family picture of everyone and we can do it around saria in the realm.~ he said thinking in his sleep around the dreams

~Wow, dreams of marrying Navi. Aren't you both quite young for that?~ Chasm thought to Fado.

~What is the age for marriage?~ fado asked

~I allow no less than 23 for marriage.~ Chasm thought/said

~How long were you there?~ he asked

~Long enough to hear you and Navi chatting as lovers.~ Chasm said.

~You heard me say your name.~ he said

~Yep~ was all Chasm said.

~I’m serious on marrying her and she is the only one for me.~ he said

~As if you wish. I shall allow, I sense that Navi loves you too. So when the time comes. My blessing shall indefinitely fall onto you in the correct sense.~ Chasm said.

~Maybe I shouldn’t rush things, but I know she is the one for me.~

~Haha. As you wish, young warrior.~ Chasm said.

~I still have to beat din and nayru’s challenges. Hmm, how am I going to plan this?~ he said thinking

~Just a piece of advice, maybe in an alternate reality, you've already beaten them. If you can get advice from that Fado, you should be able to do just about anything.~ Chasm said.

~At least that's what the legendary book says.~

~Riddle me this: how do I do that?~ he asked

~Well in theory, there lies a temple somewhere in either Earth or Felarya and it says there is a magical time/space rift one that can actually abridge the gates of time and space so you can see yourself in another world. If you were to meet and defeat yourself then absorb them, you'd become immortal.~ Chasm said.

~I have the Fairy Queen Subeta working on finding that for me.~

~Hmm, why would I become immortal?~

~I can’t see myself living forever and see everyone else die.~ he said

~That wouldn't be fun.~ Chasm said.

~why are you looking for it?~

~Meh, I'd need something to do.~ Chasm said.

~I wonder why my father didn’t see me during my childhood.~ he said thinking about him

~He was always away on adventures, needing that exploration feeling.~ Chasm said

~But if he needed the exploration feeling, he could have just stayed here with the child you. Children are especially hard to take care of.~

~What were you doing at the time? Besides being stuck in the master sword.~ he asked feeling sarcastic

~Actually, at that time I wasn't stuck in the Master Sword. I was a young god in fact the one who'd just been chosen to grant the Master Sword to the Hero Link. Yeah, I defeated that bitch Ganon, not Link.~ Chasm laughed.

~So how did you get stuck in there?~

~Like I said, chosen, not forced into.~ Chasm said.

~Was my mother chosen to be a follower for someone?~ he asked

~Yes, believe it or not, she was follower of my father, who was made godly before marriage with my mother.~

~Will she be chosen again?~

~I don't know.~ Chasm said.

~Ok.~ he said

~I’m trying to think of you as a father figure during my childhood or was that link.~ he said

~I can't tell you that.~ Chasm said.

~Why?~ he asked

~Simple Answer. I just can't, it's something God's have to keep confidential. You know, like C.I.A stuff, but for Gods~ Chasm said.

~If I become a god will you then tell me?~ he asked

~When you become a god.~ Chasm said.

~Alright.~ he said before closing his mind and going back to sleep

~You're a good kid Fado, you're father and mother must be proud.~ Chasm said.

~You can say that again.~ fado’s father said to chasm

~Haha. Good to see ya. How's your training coming along?~ Chasm asked Fado's Dad.

~Good, but does he know I’m still alive?~ he said referring to his son

~No, he thinks you’re dead and your spirit is in the Spirit Temple waiting to fight. Which that's probably true aside from the Spirit part.~ Chasm said.

~Heh, your mother ate a copy of my real body.~ he said

~Like father like son.~ he said with a smile

~You and navi were in the spirit temple, but not in far enough to see me.~ he said

~I’m in the room where the hero of time fought twinrova.~ he said

~Ah, I guess that saying is true, well I'm off. See ya later, if possible, I'd like to get a fight with you sometime as well.~ Chasm said.

~Either before or after he becomes a god, you and him with navi, the other three, and hylia come see me and you will have your chance.~ he said

~If he wins, he may find out that he has sisters that are waiting to see him in felarya.~ he said smiling

~Well, I'll tell him that.~ Chasm said.

~Don’t. or not yet. He doesn’t know that I’m a rare kind of person with the same ability as you are in your naga form.~ he said

~I would like to be the one to tell him in person instead of my spirit form.~ he said with a bit of regret

~Okay. If you're still alive, I'd still ask you of course to continue following Gaia as you always have and were chosen too.~ Chasm said, before leaving completely.

~I never stopped, but I asked her to keep me being alive a secret till I feel ready for him to find out.~ he said before leaving and return to his body

~Hey Fado.~

She grew to full size in his mind and yelled ~WAKE UP!~

He rubs her cheek before kissing it.

Fado was placed in between Navi's now giant, jiggly breasts, which was covered by a red bra and blue shirt. She used her hands to jump them up, and Fado jiggled in her boobs for minutes on end.

"But, but, but," Navi whimpered, clinging onto Fado

~Snap out of it!~ he yelled in her mind as she felt a pain because he mentally slapped her

“Navi, I love you and I trust you; but you have to trust me.” He said

"Alright, let's go back to them." Navi shyly stuttered.

He nodded before rubbing her cheek and he kissed her.

~Now I have to see if chasm will come after me for doing that mental slap to her.~ he thought to himself

~Don't worry, if it was mental, I'm fine with it, physical, I would roasted you over a lava pit.~ Chasm said to Fado

~Well, I had to do something for her to control herself and stop being scared for me.~ he said

~I wouldn’t physically slap her since I love her, but I had to do something.~

~Can I flick those two in the forehead?~ he asked referring to subeta and kana

~If they don't eat you, possibly.~ Chasm agreed.

~I can always take them to my realm with you and navi as a bonus.~ he said

~At least there I can seal their powers and bind them down.~ he added

Fado and navi walked back to the three, but he made two giant red disembodied hand with arms attached to them before he flicked both the fairy and cat dead center of their foreheads. He used enough power to make them feel it before the hands vanished and stayed on navi’s shoulder.

Feeling a little annoyed with them, fado made the move to his realm and chasm with navi came with them.

Feeling pissed off he slammed his fists in the ground making a huge crater and the wolf appeared next to him looking calm.

“Damn, I have stronger restraint on my anger than I thought.” He said fairly surprised at himself

“I’m going to be a fairy god and nothing will change my mind.” He said

“But only after he finished his training as a god of the realm and a fairy god.” He quickly added before walking to them

"So you’re becoming a Fairy Warlord, how delightful." Subeta said.

Fado’s father smiled before changing his appearance to a fairy god then a neko god before returning to his human form.

“Son, before your test meet me at the spirit temple; but I will have a surprise for you where the hero of time defeated twinrova.” He said before leaving

“Scaring her out of her mind was just playing?” he asked mocking them as he referred to navi

He just smiled before shrinking them down again and sealed their powers.

“Alright you had your fun.” Was heard behind the queens as another fado appeared and walked towards the other fado that just smiled and vanished.

"Welcome to the stage Dark Lord." Chasm said entering the realm.

~I’m still helping my wife with controlling her powers, chasm.~ dark fado said

“I’m just the real calm fado.” He said

He look towards kana and subeta before he snapped his fingers and his realm changed to look like a fairy forest surrounding a neko styled house, but they are outside drinking tea.

“Why did you want to meet me?” he asked

"Well." Kana said.

"We heard about your amazing abilities from Chasm." Subeta continued.

He thought about this and he still have to see about his father’s surprise in the spirit temple. He unsealed their powers and he nodded to them.

“Let me see what you can do and I’ll decide if you can handle it.” Fado said finished drinking his tea before taking them back to the realm and chasm appeared with navi behind fado

“Chasm, let your other daughters know that I’m planning on going to the spirit temple after this and they can come if they want, but they have to be human sized.” Fado said without taking his eyes off of kana and subeta

"So, let us go. 2 on 1, does that seem such a fair fight?" Kana asked.

Subeta agreed as Chasm walked away with Navi to see his other daughters.
1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.title: In the morning

1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Heh, two queens against me. This will be good for a warm up.” Fado said with a dark tone as his swords appeared on his back, but left them alone and got into a stance made for more than one opponent

"Kana darling, how about we make this battle a little tougher for the dear warrior here." Subeta said.

"Oh yes." Kana said, they grew to their full size then casted spells on Fado.

"Shrink Warrior." Subeta said, as a mystical light enveloped Fado, shrinking him to a centimeter tall.

"Magic and Sword Block." Kana said. Another mystical light this time enveloped the outline of Fado and his swords.

This made him almost as weak as a normal human weaker than because regular humans would be gigantic to him. But the queens appeared as if they were the size of 15 Hyrule Castles each. Kana and Subeta bent down to Fado, their leering eyes looming over him.

"Barrier of Magic Prevention." Subeta casted, making a square barrier appear around him.

"Since we're not in your realm, you can't really break our powers or anything." Kana boomed, which even in the barrier, he had to cover his ears. Subeta picked up the capsule, and looked at him intently.

"Is this tough enough for you yet? Millions of feet tall goddess, double magic prevention you couldn't even break with brute strength, shrunken to less than a cenimeter tall, and having us just tower over you like that?" Subeta boomed, even though she was whispering.

He looked at them before smiling as he sits in a meditative position concentrating his power and he started to laugh at them.

“Distraction.” He said before something pushed them to the ground and his body started to flex.

“Barrier breaker.” He said as he broke through the first magic block with his fists

“Power Magic Breaker.” He said as he broke through the second barrier with a single punch with his mind

He started to breathe hard from this, but he is still smiling feeling good and he returned to his normal size. He had a copy hidden with his invisible power ready to get them and it worked.

“What was that about not being able to break it?” he said mocking them as the marks on his arm started to glow

"Barrier Reverse." Kana and Subeta said. All the barriers reappeared on Fado, this time 100% stronger and 1000% less breakable.

“The only reason I have is that we are having the fight here is because I didn’t think it was fair having power over you.” He said

He broke the barriers again and he still smiled.

“Barrier protection.” He said as a twilight color outline around him appeared

“I’m protected from your spells.” He said

"Barrier Break." Kana said, as a white line flew from her finger slicing Fado's barrier in half.

"Human Elimination Barrier." Subeta said, putting a barrier this time absolutely unbreakable, that latched Fado's arms and legs to walls of the barrier, and it began filling with lava.

Fado began to feel the lava eat away at his body. By the time the lava was halfway up his body eaten through everything except his leg bones, Subeta ceased the lava and restored his legs. She let him out.

"Defeated. Welcome to brigade warlord." Subeta said, cuddling him against her cheek.

“Don’t let your guard down. I’m not done yet” he said before they were pushed again and he got away and the red wolf appeared next to him their sized

He grew to their size and did some martial arts moves making them feel pain before the wolf walked over to them and sit on subeta while he sit on kana.

“Give me enough time and I would have used my triforce power, but that is why I didn’t use my swords.” He said

“Don’t consider my sense of being fair for overconfidence.” He said before getting up

“You both are defeated.” He said before shrinking back down

"Whatever. It just means you’re in my army now." Subeta rejoiced jumping on him smothering him in her naked Fairy breasts.

He backed away from here by a few feet and the swords disappeared.

“Fairies have to use magic, but I sense that you, kana, are able to use swords as well.” He said

"Yep, pure diamond blades. See?" Kana said, withdrawing 2 swords, gleaming off the light. She set them down near Fado.

“Hmm, definitely something I want to test my steel against later.” He said looking at the blades

“Who made them?” he asked

"My Father, the Neko Blacksmith. He carefully crafted it in his Lava Room." Kana said stabbing the blades into the ground 5 feet away from Fado each.

He nods as he was studying the blades and the hilt of the blades.

“This work looks familiar.” He said before making his original blade appeared in his hand before focusing on his blade

"Oh." Kana said taking the small blades from Fado

She looked at the design carefully.

"Yes, yes this is my father's work."

He made his blade reappear in his hand before putting it back into its sheath.

“My blades were a gift from my father, but my mother was the one who have given them to me.” He said

He started to think before remembering something and he pulled out his flute.

“Both of you are welcome to join me at the Spirit temple, but you both will have to be human sized.” He said

"Of course, I'd would also like a chance to fight that father of yours." Kana said.

"I'd rather sit this one out; I have to get back to the kingdom, see you soon Fadi-poo." Subeta said, blowing Fado a kiss and a sexy wink before disappearing.

~I’m going ahead to the spirit temple, chasm. Kana is going with me and Subeta went back to her kingdom.~ he said to chasm
1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.title: Fight: Kana and Subeta vs Fado

choices: Fight: Nitiro vs Fado and red wolf
1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Fado teleported kana and himself to the spirit temple by using his flute and the song.

"So this is the spirit temple, I'm glad of finally got to be here. I heard that this was the most troublesome temple for the Hero of Time." Kana said.

“I wouldn’t know. It was before I was born.” He said before they entered into the main room of the temple

"That I know young warrior." Kana said, scratching his back with her grey cattail.

Fado remembers something before walking in a direction to where he thinks the boss room is.

“I think this is the way to the boss room.” He said

"I do believe so. Twinrova was defeated by the hero so there is no need to worry for any troubles getting in." Kana said.

He started to growl before pulling out his blades and the red wolf appeared next to him.

“Something is near.” He said before running for the something that he sensed

"Are you sure? I feel a calm and good presence." Kana said.

He nodded in agreement.

“Yes, I feel that and something near it like a guardian.” He said

"So what are the kitty and the warrior up to?" Chasm asked arriving with Navi and the others human sized.

Fado just ran towards what he was sensing; leaving the others behind with the wolf running besides him.

“Looking for something in the boss room.” He said as he left

"I believe what you’re looking for is right here." Fado's Father said drawing his 2 blades and setting them down upon seeing his child

"Ah, it's good to see you again. How's training been?" Chasm asked.

"From what I've gathered, there are three here to fight me. Chasm: king of Gods, My Son, Fado, and Kana the Cat Paladin/Queen." Fado's Father said.

“I thought I felt you and chasm talking in my mind.” Fado said

“I remember seeing your body in crystal like Zelda as hylia did.” He said

"Yes, but now it's time I tell you the truth. I'm not really dead. Like you, I can make copies of myself and that snake lady ate that copy of me then I fled here." Fado's Father said.

Fado looked behind his father to see the crystal with his real father in it and he growled before charging at the fake.

“I was right about the guardian.” Fado said with a sore throat

He stabbed the fake in the chest before pulling out his swords.

“I know you’re not my father.” He whispered into the fake’s ears before backing away
1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.title: To the spirit temple

1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Fado looked behind his father to see the crystal with his real father in it and he growled before charging at the fake.

“I was right about the guardian.” Fado said with a sore throat

He stabbed the fake in the chest before pulling out his swords.

“I know you’re not my father.” He whispered into the fake’s ears before backing away

"Yes, I'm am a fake. I'm what you may call, a Shapeshifter Guardian. Your father asked me to lock him up in that crystal so he can undergo much mental training. So until he's done, how's about a small battle. Me, versus you, Child of the Great Warrior." He said shapeshifting into Chasm then Navi then all 3 of the Goddesses.

Fado made a ring of copies around them leaving the others out of it and he smiled.

“He asked you to guard him?” he asked mocking him as he twirls his father’s blades in his hands

The red wolf got into attack position as he popped his neck before holding the blades in a new position that no one has seen yet.

“We’ll see about that.” He said before charging at the beast

Fado stabbed his father’s blades in the ground before pulling out his own two blades.

“Shadow bind.” Fado said as the shadows of the copies charges at the guardian and wrapped him up tight

The triforce symbol started to glow on his back before the whole floor of the room was lit up with it.

“Hmm, didn’t know it could do that.” Fado said teleporting behind the guardian and made a Z slash on his back before backing away

"Nice try Child of the Warrior." the Guardian said shape shifting into Fado and easily breaking out of the binds.

He brought out his two swords, which were the swords of Fire and Ice granted by Twinrova, of course. The wolf charged at the fake fado and bite into the arm with the fire sword as fado used his fire sword strike on the arm with the ice blade.

“Shark bait.” He said

"Hello." Guardian said behind him.

"You're not the only who can make copies."

“Really?” fado said behind him mocking him as he was slicing up his back again before backing away

"Yep." Guardian said appearing behind him and setting his shirt on fire with the fire sword.

“Fire absorption.” He said before the fire went into his body

"So, there maybe nothing I can do to you now. I concede." Guardian said, his two swords disappearing.

Fado smiled darkly before slamming him into wall and let out a deep growl.

“You are not getting out of this that easily.” He said

"Please, I'll give you your father if you release me. I am the only one who can break his cage." Guardian said.

He started to think about it before running up to the cage and slamming his right fist into the crystal before the triforce started to glow on his body.

“Triforce power breaker.” He said before seeing it crack

But the crack just filled itself in and it encased itself in a light that blew Fado away. He ran up to it and punched it, but he heard his father say something to him

~Nitiro speaks the truth, only he can break it.~ Fado's Father said mentally.

“Alright, Nitiro. Break it, but we are not finished here.” He said sheathing his swords and the copies vanished

"Oh but I believe we are. My kind are only for guarding. once the one we're guarding is released, we die. I was delighted to have had this job." Nitiro said using a regular sword to slash the crystal to pieces.

As Fado's Father fell to the ground and awoke, everyone saw Nitiro begin to disentigrate.

"I am grateful for our unfinished match, Fado." Nitiro said, as the last of his body vanished into thin air.

He pulled out his flute and started to play his song. The effect of the song varies, but this time its bringing nitiro’s back with his soul.

“Nitiro, there is another term for guarding someone and it doesn’t have to be mean encasing them in crystal.” Fado said before walking to his father and helping him up

"No, for your father had said himself that when his son comes, and I break him free, my time as his guardian would be up, and I can leave peacefully. Goodbye." Nitiro said.

“What if I want you to guard me?” he asked before hitting nitiro upside his head

"It's too late. I'm gone." Nitiro said before disappearing completely so not even Fado's songs could bring him back
1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.title: Fight: Nitiro vs Fado and red wolf

1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Fado looked at his father before punching him in the face with a hard right jab.

“That was for making me think you were dead.” He said before going to land another punch on him

Just before landing, Kana drew one of her swords and Fado punched that sending a painful jolt through his hand, almost breaking his hand. He gritted his teeth before grabbing his father and slamming him against the wall.

“Do you know how bad I felt when I thought you were dead?” he asked extremely pissed off

"I'm very sorry son." was all he said.

“Sorry? Is that the best you can say?” he asked mocking him

“All my life I thought if I even had a father. Not once during my childhood did I see you and I just heard about you from my mother that you died by that snake bitch after chasm’s good friend menyassan ate her and saved mom from being killed by her.” He said before striking another punch at him, but he missed and hit the wall not caring about what damage is done to his hand

"I'm sorry son. I had to conceal my face as everyone in Hyrule Town saw my copy get eaten. So I retreated here." Fado's Father said.

“Mom almost died trying to save your copy. A real fighter would have come back to the town after their copy would have been eaten.” He said before landing another punch to his face

“You’re not sorry for anything.” He said with pure hate, sorrow and a little regret before leaving the temple heading off somewhere

"Son!" Fado's Father said chasing after him.

"Woah, Buuuuureakdown." Chasm and everyone else said.

~Chasm, you and kana can fight him. I’m not in the mood to listen and he should apologize to mom first before coming after me.~ fado said before making his father appeared with them

"I must get to him, there is no other option." Fado's father said, taking off running again.

He ran into a wall barrier that fado made to stop him from going after him. Fado's Father just slashed through the barrier with his swords and kept doing this. Eventually, he caught up to Fado.

“First apologize to mom and then maybe I’ll listen to you, dad.” He said that last part is sarcasm

Fado teleported to his realm and sealed it tight so he cut through it. Fado's Father did as his son said and walked to Hyrule City before climbing up the building their mansion was placed on.

"Whatever happened to our old brick house?" Fado's Father yelled almost falling off the building.

~Hylia made this as a gift for us and I had copies moved everything from the old house to in here.~ fado explained before cutting off from his mind

Dark fado appeared at the temple to speak with the others about his light side.

“I understand what he is feeling, but I think only hylia, navi, and one of the three can talk to him at this point.” He said

"Yes of course, Navi, Hylia, can you both go calm Fado down? I'm gonna go find his father." Chasm said, leaving with Kana, Din, Nayru, and Farore.

“He is at his house with fado’s mother apologizing to her.” Dark fado said before leaving through a portal to be with his wife

~Can I feel her fur?~ fado asked about kana in a hurt tone, but opened his realm to hylia, navi, and kana; but still not his father

"I don't have much fur, just my hair and tail." Kana said once she was in there.

Navi and Hylia just comforted Fado at their human sizes.

The realm has red sky, the water is angry, and the land was barren like a desert as fado was still crying even though he was slowly calming down.

~What I did to hylia was only a tenth of what I did my father, but he asked for it.~ he said in his mind, but they can hear it and he doesn’t feel like talking with his mouth

He noticed a cattail was around him with navi and hylia, but he started to pet it.

~I remember chasm talking to my father, but I didn’t know he was still alive. It hurt to hear him was dead, but it hurt even worse that he went into hiding after being eating.~ he said

"Dad told us of this and how he predicted you would react, but he didn't predict it like this though. He thought you would just punch your dad once, then move on; but we didn't expect it to happen that way. Not at all." Navi said, hugging Fado.

~Try living the life I had growing up and then you might understand why.~ he said crying into navi and hylia as they hugged him

~Cats were my favorite kind of pet and I wanted one, but mom said that they were hard to care for.~ he said with a small smile at the memory still petting the tail

"Well here, as long as you keep it well fed and taken care of. Here’s this baby one that was given birth to just a month ago." Kana said handing him a baby white fur cat that was sleeping gently.

~Thanks, but I can’t. I don’t know if I can take it out of the realm yet and I need to be calm.~ he said handing it back to kana

“Maybe after we get out of here and back to the house.” He said before looking at them with tears in his eyes

The water is calming down and the land is returning back to normal, but the sky is still red.

"You're still mad, I can sense it." Kana said.

"Yeah, just calm down Fado. It’s not cool to act like this." Hylia said splashing his face with cold water.

"Maybe this will help." Navi said giving Fado a kiss.

The sun blasted the red sky and clouds away as steam was coming out of his ears from the kiss.

~Wow.~ he said before standing on the water

“Ok. I’m better.” He said with a devious smile and a giant water cannon was formed behind him

"Nice, Young goddess, Navi." Kana said patting Navi on the back.

"Now let's get him!" Hylia said.

Navi paired on Fado's side and it was just an all-out water fight for at least 2 hours. Fado is still standing, but he kissed navi on the lips, kissed hylia on the forehead, and kissed kana on the cheek.

“Thanks for helping me, but I will still feel hurt by my father and nothing will change that.” He said before sitting down next to them

“I wonder what else he hid from me.” He said referring about his father

He felt a sharp pain in his mind and it was fado.

The water flowed up his arms before his arms absorbed it and their muscles grew an inch or two as they gained more detailed. He made the water moved into his chest muscles before flowing it into his hair, which grew longer and he had the water leave his body through hair. He burned his hair dry making it short again and he put his shirt on.

He pulls himself out and looked at her.

Hylia used Water Inflation; it aged her and quite fast at that it gave her DD-cup breasts, a tight dress, and long flowing brown hair. It also made her look much taller and older. She stood up to her full height, and Fado was only taller by her pinkie toe by an inch.

He just shrug his shoulders before making a water kana appear before having it turn itself into a cat.

“Yeah, let’s go see them at the house.” He said before teleporting himself to the house

Everyone laughed and headed towards Hyrule City.

He nodded before handing her to kana and sitting next to his mother as he noticed his father on the ground in the fetal position.

He turned to see chasm sitting in a chair and his daughters are sitting on the couch next to him as he and his mother are sitting on the loveseat. There is another chair for dad to sit, but not with him like that so kana is sitting in it with snowflake.

"I cannot let this fool fight the Goddess Nayru I worship so dearly." Zakon said.

They all charged up the swords using the power of the sun and cross the swords making a bright flash of light continually making Fado blind for flashing seconds.

"This light will not wear off." Kazim said.

"For as long as we stay standing, it is there." Tru said.

"I cannot let you defeat me or my brothers." Zakon said.

They can see a smile before fado blindfolding himself and he pulled out his sword as he got into a stance.

“I will win this fight.” Fado said before teleporting behind them and slashed a deep Z into their backs making them bleed

Fado thought he did this, but he actually had made three Z's in the ground, missing the trio completely.

"You fall now!" the Trio said, slashing their swords across Fado's body, making it ravaged with cuts and scars that bled.

"This match is over, the winners: Kazim, Tru, and Zakon." Navi announced.

“Not even close, Navi.” A voice said before scars suddenly appeared on their bodies and they are bleeding as the real fado appeared smiled

"Sorry Fado, but now you're disqualified, magic was not allowed in this battle. Magic includes making copies." Navi then said, consulting a scroll, which read that rule in tiny print.

The trio healed themselves now that the match is over.

"Good match Fado, see ya when you want a rematch." Kazim said, shaking his hand.

"You did your best." Tru admitted.

"But you couldn't match us." Zakon said.

"Sorry Fado, but now you're disqualified, magic was not allowed in this battle. Magic includes making copies." Navi then said, consulting a scroll, which read that rule in tiny print.

The trio healed themselves now that the match is over.

"Good match Fado, see ya when you want a rematch." Kazim said, shaking his hand.

"You did your best." Tru admitted.

"But you couldn't match us." Zakon said.

1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
He left the arena to be in his realm and he did his own training.

"Fado are you okay?" Navi asked, coming into his realm.

“Yeah.” He said as he continued his training

"I can sense you’re upset." Navi said, laying down next to where he was training.

"Why are you so depressed?"

Navi gave him a kiss on his forehead.

“I’m not upset or depressed.” He said

"Don't hide it Fado, I can feel it in your heart." Navi said, giving his chest a little tickle.

He stopped his training before sitting down next to navi.

“Those three know after I was done with nayru’s challenge that it was going to going to be me and a clone against them. Not some jokers they that they send me and it was a part of the deal we had, but I let it slide.” He said sighing

"Then let me guess. Thinking we were simple humane beginners made you want to go easy on us." Kazim said, entering his realm.

“You will never know what I was thinking.” He said before pushing Kazim out of his realm and sealing it, but let navi come and go if she wants

"Fado." Navi said, smacking Fado.

"Kazim is my brother."

He didn’t say anything and went back to his training.

"Fado, speak to me. Why did you kick my brother out of your realm.?" Navi said.

“It was nothing personal, but I need to focus on my training for the right fight with your sisters.” He said

"You'll still have to fight with my brother and his friends first." Navi said.

He sighed before putting on his blindfold and do his training that way, but not before kissing her on the lips.

“I’ll let you know when to get them back here for a rematch.” He said before gently pushing her out of his realm

Navi stayed silent and went to Hyrule so she could chat with her brother and his friends. Fado sealed his realm before going back to training and he sent navi an image of them at the lake with a picnic type of date. Navi sent it back angrily. Whenever Fado tried to send it back, she'd had blocked him from her mind completely.

~Thought I would get a blush out of it.~ he said to himself before shrugging his shoulders

He sighed before letting it go and went to fish.

While fishing, Chasm appeared next to Fado.

"So Navi is angry, why?" He asked.

Fado showed him what happened before this in his memories.

“Something I must have did like pushing her brother, kazim out of here.” He said before making a fishing rod appear in chasm’s hands

“You can join me if you want.” He said before sitting down on the ground in front of a lake

"Navi has a brother. Guess I'll have to make the boy a god then." Chasm said, flashing out.

He sighed.

“I’m not upset, but maybe a little depressed.” He said to himself

"Maybe if you weren't such a jerk to my brother, I would've stayed." Navi said, appearing.

He sighed again before turning his away not looking at her.

“Sometimes I don’t like people popping in on me like your brother did.” He said in a low tone, but there was a sad tone in it

“I come here for a certain reason each time that I come here even when I bring people in here.” He added before resting his head on his knees

"Well, don't worry. I'm not that mad anymore." Navi said.

She picked him up and gave him a kiss. He smiled before kissing her back.

“I’m glad.” He said

"Well, Dad is making my brother a god, so you'll have an even tougher time beating him and his friends." Navi said.

~Chasm, can you hold off on making navi’s brother a god?~ fado asked

~Why? Don't you like a challenge?~ Chasm asked.

~I like a challenge, but I want to fight him after I finished my training and beat him.~ he said

~Fine.~ Chasm said.

~But you still have to face the three in battle. Not just Kazim. There is no change to that. It's going to be the same with your match against the three daughters of mine. One v Three. Same rules and regulations apply. But if you're that handicapped, maybe I can get Kana to help.~

~That is fine with me.~ he said before going back to his training

~I see you agree to terms.~ Chasm said.

~I do.~ he said

~Alright.~ Chasm said.

“Navi, do you want to help me train?” he asked her

"No, I'm gonna go tell Kana. She needs to develop the power to shrink herself." Navi said.

“Alright.” He said

"Bye." Navi said.

He nodded before going back to his senses training.
1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.title: Fado in training

1553311211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Fado, having been left by Nayru, so she could judge the fights, was left to find the seats on his own.

"At least she have left me at the stands." he said

Just then, a shadow cupped over him, and smashed onto him, light enough to not kill him, but also hard enough to stick him to the place.

"I should really put my sandals on." a feminine voice said, as sandals were slipped on.

Fado could only conclude from here he was stuck on a female foot. He tried to peel himself off, but he was stuck against the tan-white foot.

~Maybe I can talk with whose foot this is.~ he thought to himself

He was pounded between foot and sandal, blocking mind waves. He tried rubbing the foot, but he was still pounded until he could taste the foot sweat.

"Now where are the seats?" the voice asked from above

"Hey check your foot." he yelled

Whoever it was couldn't hear as Fado was very tiny compared to this girl. He beat against the foot.
He only was trapped against the foot so he couldn't move any of his limbs. It was all up to the girl to notice him herself.

~She better feel me soon or i'm poke her foot with my swords.~ he said

Fado then felt something snap on his back and knew it was his swords.

"Dammit. I just had to say something." Fado said

He chanted a fixing spell on his swords before using the nayru's love chant on them. Fado began to feel the Chant and it snapped before snapping his swords once more.

He fixed his swords again. He felt the walking stop, and the feet began to tap, smashing his swords to bits, and he heard yelling and swords clashing. He decided to wait when the tapping stop before he could repair his swords again.

"Wait...what's under my foot?" the female from above asked.

She removed her sandal and peeled Fado from her foot.

"A Human?" She said curious.

“Freedom.” He said before repairing his swords

“You really need to watch where you step.” He said

"Says the runt who dare slip under the foot of a Neko Princess." She said.

"i didn't slip under your foot; you weren't watching where you were stepping." he said

"Please. I don't need a peasently runt trying to blame me for something." She said.

"I am the Neko Princess, my name is Kana Ishikara. This meeting is your fault, but I am pleased to meet you."

“I’m fado.” He said before showing her what happened in his memories and it was the truth

"You do know I can't see in your mind." Kana said.

“I can send my memories into you.” He said before doing it

It was unable to go into Kana's mind.

“Well, I always tell the truth, miss kana.” He said

"Miss. I am no old lady. If you are to call me by a title you runt, you should call me Princess Ishikara." She said frowning.

“You are starting to be rude, miss kana.” He said

"I am higher than you, in more than one way." Kana said.

"Now, would you like to learn respect and humility?"

"Heh, it seems you need to learn those things." He said looking at her

“You need to give respect in order to get it.” He added

"I am a Princess. I earn respect when I look at people." Kana said.

“Besides I only got stuck on your foot because nayru left me to find my own seat.” He said

"Well, maybe I'll place you down by my toes and you can learn what it means to worship a princess." Kana said.

“That will not happen.” He said before teleporting away from her and went to find his own seat

He wished he could do that, but what happened was Kana had disabled his powers with her powers as a neko.

"You cannot escape me." Kana giggled.

“I aleady did, princess.” He said from the ground and she has disabled a clone’s powers

He ran off to find his own seat, but he stopped and looked at her.

“I’ll give you some respect if you are nice to me.” He said

"I shall be. I may even take you to my homeland." Kana said.

“That may be a bad idea.” He said teleporting on her shoulder

“I’m busy with nayru and I’m in the middle of a challenge, but I’m on a break for now.” He added

"So would you mind respecting the princess and giving her a little worship?" Kana asked

“Can’t do it.” He said flatly

“I just can’t.” he added

"Why is that?" Kana asked.

"Maybe you need incentive?"

Fado was pressed against Kana's lips, and she felt him get a boner, as she felt the bulge against her lips.

He made himself teleport away from her lips.

“Maybe there is another way.” He said

"Why don't you just give the one bigger than you a tad of worship?" Kana asked.

“Well, you are cute; but still can’t do it.” He said

"And why is that?" Kana asked.

“I don’t know how to explain it. Maybe you can ask chasm about it.” He said

"Who is Chasm?" Kana asked.

“Nayru’s father.” He said

"Oh, well that's interesting." Kana said.

"Would that mean he is a Water God?"

“More like the king of gods and goddesses.” He said

"Oh wow, isn't that him fighting down there?" Kana asked as she showed Fado the fight

It was Chasm with 2 Fierce Deity Swords facing all three of his daughters at once.

“Yep.” He said

"Wow, he's amazing!" Kana said.

“Wait, are you a little young to be by yourself?” he asked

"No, I have guards two rows back; if they see me in trouble, they'll pounce." Kana said.

“Hmm.” He said

"It looks like this match is almost over." Kana said.

Chasm beat his daughters, then disabling his power shield.

"Maybe I should return to the kingdom now." Kana said.

"Would you like to come?"

“I can’t.” he said

“I have something to do, but thanks for the offer.” He said with a smile

“Maybe next time.” He added before teleporting over to see chasm and the girls

"Hello Fado." Chasm said in the arena.

"I saw you got acquainted with the Neko Princess."

"Hey Fado, how about a more tough challenge." Din asked.

"How about facing me?"

“Maybe later, but nayru should not have left me to where I could get stepped on.” He said with a glare

“The princess kept wanting me to worship her and I just couldn’t do it.” He said to chasm
